	{
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	background-color: #03396c;
}

.editorial {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 60px;
	max-height: 60px;
	margin: 0;
	z-index: 5;
	bottom: 0;
	position: absolute;
	left: 0px;
	float: left;
}

.parallax1>use {
	animation: move-forever1 10s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax2>use {
	animation: move-forever2 8s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax3>use {
	animation: move-forever3 6s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax4>use {
	animation: move-forever4 4s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever1 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever2 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever3 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever4 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}
}

* {
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Float four columns side by side */
.column {
	float: left;
	width: 25%;
	padding: 0 10px;
}

/* Remove extra left and right margins, due to padding */
.row {
	margin: 0 -5px;
}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
	content: "";
	display: table;
	clear: both;
}

/* Responsive columns */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.column {
		width: 100%;
		display: block;
		margin-bottom: 20px;
	}
}

/* Style the counter cards */
.card {
	box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
	padding: 16px;
	text-align: center;
	background-color: #f1f1f1;
	border-radius: 28px;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: -65px;
	left: 100px;
	width: 65%;
}

.card img {
	border-radius: 30px;
	max-height: 75px;
	border: 3px solid grey;
	padding: 4px;
	background: white;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 20px;
	left: -25px;
}

#requestDemoModal iframe {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}

.navbar-nav>li>a {
	padding-bottom: 7px;
}

/*@media (min-width: 768px) {*/
div.mainmenu {
	padding: 0px;
	float: right;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
	.btn#edsearch {
		font-weight: 600;
		font-size: 16px;
	}
}

.main_header {
	color: white;
	font-size: 28px;
	font-weight: 800;
	margin-top: 10px;
	padding: 0 40px;
}

.navbar-nav>li {
	/*float: left;*/
	padding-left: 10px;
}

.imgtopright {
	text-align: center;
}

section.section {
	/*min-height: 45rem;
		height: 100%;*/
	min-height: 85vh;
	padding: 0 0 30px;
}

section,
summary {
	display: block;
}



.scrollination {
	position: fixed;
	top: 50%;
	right: 20px;
	transform: translateY(-50%);
	font-size: 1.4em;
	z-index: 10;
}

.scrollination a.active:after {
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
}

.scrollination a {
	display: block;
	width: 110px;
	height: 25px;
	border-radius: 50%;
	color: #fff;
	position: relative;
	padding: 4px;
}

.scrollination a:after {
	-webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	width: 12px;
	height: 12px;
	display: block;
	border: 2px solid;
	border-radius: 50%;
	content: '';
	position: absolute;
	margin: auto;
	top: 0;
	right: 4px;
	bottom: 0;
}

.scrollination a .hover-text {
	position: absolute;
	right: 20px;
	top: -5px;
	opacity: 0;
	-webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	padding: 0 5px;
	background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	text-decoration: underline;
	margin-right: 5px;
}

.dropdown-menu>li>a:hover,
.dropdown-menu>li>a:focus {
	color: white;
	text-decoration: none;
	background-color: dodgerblue;
}

.scrollination a:hover .hover-text {
	opacity: 1;
}

	display: block;
	width: 100%;

	-o-transition: border-color ease-in-out .15s, box-shadow ease-in-out .15s;
	transition: border-color ease-in-out .15s, box-shadow ease-in-out .15s;
}

.div-transparent:before {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 5%;
	right: 5%;
	width: 90%;
	height: 1px;
	background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, rgb(48, 49, 51), transparent);
}

.div-arrow-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -7px;
	left: calc(50% - 7px);
	width: 14px;
	height: 14px;
	transform: rotate(45deg);
	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
}

.div-tab-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: 0;
	left: calc(50% - 10px);
	width: 50px;
	height: 24px;

	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid white;
	border-left: 1px solid white;
	border-right: 1px solid white;
	border-radius: 0 0 38px 38px;
}

.div-stopper:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -6px;
	left: calc(50% - 7px);
	width: 14px;
	height: 12px;
	background-color: white;
	border-left: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
}

.div-dot:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -9px;
	left: calc(50% - 9px);
	width: 18px;
	height: 18px;
	background-color: rgb(35, 161, 219);
	border: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-radius: 50%;
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px white,
		0 0 0 4px white;
}

			jQuery("#schoolcount").animateNumber({
				number: response.schoolcount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
			jQuery("#teachercount").animateNumber({
				number: response.teachercount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
			jQuery("#studentcount").animateNumber({
				number: response.studentcount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
		}
	});
});

	var myCoursesVal = $(this).val();
	if (myCoursesVal == "School Admin") {
		$("#GetFreeAccess").attr("href", "https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/schools/school-admin-account-review-math-ela-resources.html");
	} else if (myCoursesVal == "Teacher") {

	} else if (myCoursesVal == "Parent/Student") {

});




$(document).on('click', '#type-state-selection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	$("#userSelectionEditModal").modal();
	if (getCookie("userState") != '' && getCookie("userState") != null && getCookie("userType") != '' && getCookie("userType") != null && getCookie("userAssessment") != '' && getCookie("userAssessment") != null) {
		var userState = getCookie("userState");
		var userType = getCookie("userType");
		var userGrade = getCookie("userGrade");
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState').find('option[value="' + userState + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType').find('option[value="' + userType + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade').find('option[value="' + userGrade + '"]').attr("selected", true);
	}
});


$(document).on('click', '#saveUserSelection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
		if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a State. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User tType. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User Grarde. Please select one.");
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		var userState = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").val();
		var userType = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType option:selected").val();
		var userGrade = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade option:selected").val();
		var userAssessment = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").attr('attr-assessment');
		setCookie("userState", userState, 30);
		setCookie("userType", userType, 30);
		setCookie("userAssessment", userAssessment, 30);
		setCookie("userGrade", userGrade, 30);
	}
	location.reload();
});

					var fields = forms[ i ].getElementsByTagName( 'input' );

						var field = fields[ j ];

							break;
						}
					}
				}
			} );
		},

			wpcf7recaptcha.execute( actions[ 'homepage' ] );

	);

	);

		wpcf7recaptcha.executeOnHomepage, false
	);

} )(

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

}

img.wp-smiley,
img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
	height: 1em !important;
	width: 1em !important;
	margin: 0 .07em !important;
	vertical-align: -0.1em !important;
	background: none !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
}






























body {
	padding-top: 0px;
	max-width: 100%;
	overflow-x: hidden;
}

a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}

img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}

.btn:hover,
.btn:focus {
	background-color: red;

}

a.btn.btn-danger.login-btn:hover {
	background-color: green;
}


#footer {
	background-color: #ececec !important;
}

#grad1 {
	height: 200px;
	background-image: linear-gradient(blue, dodgerblue)
}

#footer h4,
#footer a,

.editorial {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 60px;
	max-height: 60px;
	margin: 0;
	z-index: 5;
	bottom: 0;
	position: absolute;
	left: 0px;
	float: left;
}

.parallax1>use {
	animation: move-forever1 10s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax2>use {
	animation: move-forever2 8s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax3>use {
	animation: move-forever3 6s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax4>use {
	animation: move-forever4 4s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever1 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever2 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever3 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever4 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}
}

* {

body {
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Float four columns side by side */
.column {
	float: left;
	width: 25%;
	padding: 0 10px;
}

/* Remove extra left and right margins, due to padding */
.row {
	margin: 0 -5px;
}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
	content: "";
	display: table;
	clear: both;
}

/* Responsive columns */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.column {
		width: 100%;
		display: block;
		margin-bottom: 20px;
	}
}

/* Style the counter cards */
.card {
	box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
	padding: 16px;
	text-align: center;
	background-color: #f1f1f1;
	border-radius: 28px;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: -65px;
	left: 100px;
	width: 65%;
}

.card img {
	border-radius: 30px;
	max-height: 75px;
	border: 3px solid grey;
	padding: 4px;
	background: white;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 20px;
	left: -25px;
}

.scrollination {
	position: fixed;
	top: 50%;
	right: 20px;
	transform: translateY(-50%);
	font-size: 1.4em;
	z-index: 10;
}

.scrollination a.active:after {
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
}

.scrollination a {
	display: block;
	width: 110px;
	height: 25px;
	border-radius: 50%;
	color: #fff;
	position: relative;
	padding: 4px;
}

.scrollination a:after {
	-webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	width: 12px;
	height: 12px;
	display: block;
	border: 2px solid;
	border-radius: 50%;
	content: '';
	position: absolute;
	margin: auto;
	top: 0;
	right: 4px;
	bottom: 0;
}

.scrollination a .hover-text {
	position: absolute;
	right: 20px;
	top: -5px;
	opacity: 0;
	-webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	padding: 0 5px;
	background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	text-decoration: underline;
	margin-right: 5px;
}

.dropdown-menu>li>a:hover,
.dropdown-menu>li>a:focus {
	color: white;
	text-decoration: none;
	background-color: dodgerblue;
}

.scrollination a:hover .hover-text {
	opacity: 1;
}

a.link-style,
.link-style a {
	display: inline-block;
	padding: 14px 25px;
	color: #fff;
	font-family: 'Open Sans', Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	font-size: 15px;
	position: relative;
	background: #e9242e;
	text-align: center;
	border-radius: 5px;
	line-height: 20px;
	letter-spacing: 1px;
	cursor: pointer;
	font-weight: 600;
}

.div-transparent:before {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 5%;
	right: 5%;
	width: 90%;
	height: 1px;
	background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, rgb(48, 49, 51), transparent);
}

.div-arrow-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -7px;
	left: calc(50% - 7px);
	width: 14px;
	height: 14px;
	transform: rotate(45deg);
	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
}

.div-tab-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: 0;
	left: calc(50% - 10px);
	width: 50px;
	height: 24px;

	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid white;
	border-left: 1px solid white;
	border-right: 1px solid white;
	border-radius: 0 0 38px 38px;
}

.div-stopper:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;

	border: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-radius: 50%;
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px white,

$(document).on('click', '#type-state-selection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	$("#userSelectionEditModal").modal();
	if (getCookie("userState") != '' && getCookie("userState") != null && getCookie("userType") != '' && getCookie("userType") != null && getCookie("userAssessment") != '' && getCookie("userAssessment") != null) {
		var userState = getCookie("userState");
		var userType = getCookie("userType");
		var userGrade = getCookie("userGrade");
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState').find('option[value="' + userState + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType').find('option[value="' + userType + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade').find('option[value="' + userGrade + '"]').attr("selected", true);
	}
});


$(document).on('click', '#saveUserSelection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
		if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a State. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User tType. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User Grarde. Please select one.");
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		var userState = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").val();
		var userType = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType option:selected").val();
		var userGrade = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade option:selected").val();
		var userAssessment = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").attr('attr-assessment');
		setCookie("userState", userState, 30);
		setCookie("userType", userType, 30);
		setCookie("userAssessment", userAssessment, 30);
		setCookie("userGrade", userGrade, 30);
	}
	location.reload();
});

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;

body {
	padding-top: 0px;
	max-width: 100%;
	overflow-x: hidden;
}
a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
.btn:hover,
.btn:focus {
	background-color: red;

}

a.btn.btn-danger.login-btn:hover {
	background-color: green;
}
div.wpcf7-validation-errors, div.wpcf7-acceptance-missing {
    border: 2px solid #f7e700;
    color: white;
}
div.wpcf7-mail-sent-ok {
    border: 2px solid #398f14;
    color: white;
}
#footer {
	background-color: #ececec !important;
}
#grad1 {
  height: 200px;
  background-image: linear-gradient(blue, dodgerblue)
}

#footer h4,
#footer a,
.contact-list i,
.contact-list li,
#footer p {
	color: black !important;
}

.contact-list i {
	border: 1px solid black !important;
}

#footer hr,
.footer-bottom {
	border-top: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 1) !important;
}

iframe {
	max-width: 100% !important;
}

.navbar-header {
	float: none;
}

.dropdown-menu {

	min-width: 224px;

}

.navbar-inverse {
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	background: white;
}

.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	/*height: 70px;*/
	padding: 0;
}

.scroll-fixed-navbar.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	padding: 0;
}

.logo_container {
	overflow-x: hidden;
}

.logo_container img {
	width: 70px;
}

.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
	padding: 5px 10px;
}

.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 30px;
}

/*.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	font-size: 22px;
	}*/

.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus {
	color: #2a6496;
}

.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus {
	color: rgb(30, 144, 255);
	background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}

.requestdemo1 {
	position: fixed;
	width: auto;
	right: 0px;
	top: initial !important;
	z-index: 9999;
	bottom: 60px;
}
div.requestdemo1 {
	z-index: 9999;
}
.requestdemo1 a {
	display: block;
}

.loginform {
	z-index: 100;
	margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
	height: 31px;
	overflow: hidden;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
}

.loginform a.login {
	height: 31px;
	width: 112px;
	text-indent: -9999px;
	display: block;
	background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/login_link_bg.png?x78814);
	margin: 0px auto;
}

.type-state-selection {
	margin: 18px 10px 0;
}

div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] {
	top: 105px !important;
}

.modal button.close {
	margin-top: -15px;
	font-size: 30px;
}

{
  margin:0;
  padding:0;
  background-color:#03396c;
}

.editorial {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 60px;
  max-height: 60px;
  margin: 0;
  z-index:5;
  bottom:0;
  position:absolute;
  left:0px;
  float:left;
}

.parallax1 > use {
  animation: move-forever1 10s linear infinite;
  &:nth-child(1) {
    animation-delay: -2s;
  }
}
.parallax2 > use {
  animation: move-forever2 8s linear infinite;
  &:nth-child(1) {
    animation-delay: -2s;
  }
}
.parallax3 > use {
  animation: move-forever3 6s linear infinite;
  &:nth-child(1) {
    animation-delay: -2s;
  }
}
.parallax4 > use {
  animation: move-forever4 4s linear infinite;
  &:nth-child(1) {
    animation-delay: -2s;
  }
}
@keyframes move-forever1 {
  0% {
    transform: translate(85px, 0%);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
  }
}
@keyframes move-forever2 {
  0% {
    transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(85px, 0%);
  }
}
@keyframes move-forever3 {
  0% {
    transform: translate(85px, 0%);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
  }
}
@keyframes move-forever4 {
  0% {
    transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translate(85px, 0%);
  }
}

ul.homelinks li a.call-us {
	margin: 0px 0 0px;
	background: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/callus.png?x78814) no-repeat 8px 8px;
	border-top: 5px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
}

	color: white;
}

ul.homelinks li a {
	width: 100%;

	text-align: left;
	/* width: 301px; */

}

	div.mainmenu {
		padding: 0px;
		float: right;
	}

	@media screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
		.btn#edsearch {
			font-weight: 600;
			font-size: 16px;
		}
	}

	.main_header {
		color: white;
		font-size: 28px;
		font-weight: 800;
		margin-top: 10px;
		padding: 0 40px;

	.navbar-nav>li {
		/*float: left;*/
		padding-left: 10px;
	}

	.imgtopright {
		text-align: center;
	}

	section.section {
		/*min-height: 45rem;
	height: 100%;*/
		min-height: 85vh;
		padding: 0 0 30px;
	}

	section,
	summary {
		display: block;
	}



	.scrollination {
		position: fixed;
		top: 50%;
		right: 20px;
		transform: translateY(-50%);
		font-size: 1.4em;
		z-index: 10;
	}

	.scrollination a.active:after {
		box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
	}

	.scrollination a {
		display: block;
		width: 110px;
		height: 25px;
		border-radius: 50%;
		color: #fff;
		position: relative;
		padding: 4px;
	}

	.scrollination a:after {
		-webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
		transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
		width: 12px;
		height: 12px;
		display: block;
		border: 2px solid;
		border-radius: 50%;
		content: '';
		position: absolute;
		margin: auto;
		top: 0;
		right: 4px;
		bottom: 0;
	}

	.scrollination a .hover-text {
		position: absolute;
		right: 20px;
		top: -5px;
		opacity: 0;
		-webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
		transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
		padding: 0 5px;
		background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
		text-decoration: underline;
		margin-right: 5px;
	}

	.scrollination a:hover .hover-text {
		opacity: 1;
	}

.div-transparent:before {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 5%;
	right: 5%;
	width: 90%;
	height: 1px;
	background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, rgb(48, 49, 51), transparent);
}

.div-arrow-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -7px;
	left: calc(50% - 7px);
	width: 14px;
	height: 14px;
	transform: rotate(45deg);
	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
}

.div-tab-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: 0;
	left: calc(50% - 10px);
	width: 50px;
	height: 24px;

	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid white;
	border-left: 1px solid white;
	border-right: 1px solid white;
	border-radius: 0 0 38px 38px;
}

.div-stopper:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -6px;
	left: calc(50% - 7px);
	width: 14px;
	height: 12px;
	background-color: white;
	border-left: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
}

.div-dot:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -9px;
	left: calc(50% - 9px);
	width: 18px;
	height: 18px;
	background-color: rgb(35, 161, 219);
	border: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-radius: 50%;
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px white,
		0 0 0 4px white;
}

function numberWithCommas(x) {
	return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
}

$(document).ready(function() {

	$.ajax({
		url: "/llp/lumos_user_count_json.php",
		success: function(response) {
			var response = response.result;
			var comma_separator_number_step = jQuery.animateNumber.numberStepFactories.separator(',')
			jQuery("#schoolcount").animateNumber({
				number: response.schoolcount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
			jQuery("#teachercount").animateNumber({
				number: response.teachercount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
			jQuery("#studentcount").animateNumber({
				number: response.studentcount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
		}
	});
});

$(document).on('click', '#type-state-selection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	$("#userSelectionEditModal").modal();
	if (getCookie("userState") != '' && getCookie("userState") != null && getCookie("userType") != '' && getCookie("userType") != null && getCookie("userAssessment") != '' && getCookie("userAssessment") != null) {
		var userState = getCookie("userState");
		var userType = getCookie("userType");
		var userGrade = getCookie("userGrade");
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState').find('option[value="' + userState + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType').find('option[value="' + userType + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade').find('option[value="' + userGrade + '"]').attr("selected", true);
	}
});


$(document).on('click', '#saveUserSelection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
		if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a State. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User tType. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User Grarde. Please select one.");
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		var userState = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").val();
		var userType = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType option:selected").val();
		var userGrade = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade option:selected").val();
		var userAssessment = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").attr('attr-assessment');
		setCookie("userState", userState, 30);
		setCookie("userType", userType, 30);
		setCookie("userAssessment", userAssessment, 30);
		setCookie("userGrade", userGrade, 30);
	}
	location.reload();
});

( function( grecaptcha, sitekey, actions ) {

	var wpcf7recaptcha = {

		execute: function( action ) {
			grecaptcha.execute(
				sitekey,
				{ action: action }
			).then( function( token ) {
				var forms = document.getElementsByTagName( 'form' );

				for ( var i = 0; i < forms.length; i++ ) {
					var fields = forms[ i ].getElementsByTagName( 'input' );

					for ( var j = 0; j < fields.length; j++ ) {
						var field = fields[ j ];

						if ( 'g-recaptcha-response' === field.getAttribute( 'name' ) ) {
							field.setAttribute( 'value', token );
							break;
						}
					}
				}
			} );
		},

		executeOnHomepage: function() {
			wpcf7recaptcha.execute( actions[ 'homepage' ] );
		},

		executeOnContactform: function() {
			wpcf7recaptcha.execute( actions[ 'contactform' ] );
		},

	};

	grecaptcha.ready(
		wpcf7recaptcha.executeOnHomepage
	);

	document.addEventListener( 'change',
		wpcf7recaptcha.executeOnContactform, false
	);

	document.addEventListener( 'wpcf7submit',
		wpcf7recaptcha.executeOnHomepage, false
	);

} )(
	grecaptcha,
	'6LfDE4UUAAAAAKqXFvbqLRjE-O_1IMU8rb25S1PD',

);

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");

}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

img.wp-smiley,
img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
	height: 1em !important;
	width: 1em !important;
	margin: 0 .07em !important;
	vertical-align: -0.1em !important;
	background: none !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
}




























body {
	padding-top: 0px;
}
a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
iframe {
	max-width: 100% !important;
}
.navbar-header {
	float: none;
}
.navbar-inverse {
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	background: white;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	height: 70px;
	padding: 0;
}
.scroll-fixed-navbar.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	padding: 0px;
}
.logo_container {
	overflow-x: hidden;
}
.logo_container img {
	width: 70px;
}
.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
	padding: 5px 10px;
}
.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	font-size: 22px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus {
	color: rgb(30, 144, 255);
	background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.requestdemo1 {
	position: fixed;
	width: auto;
	right: 0px;
	top: 275px;
	z-index: 9999;
}
.requestdemo1 a {
	display: block;
}
.loginform {
	z-index: 100;
	margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
	height: 31px;
	overflow: hidden;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
}
.loginform a.login {

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

.scrollination {
  position: fixed;
  top: 50%;
  right: 20px;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  font-size: 1.4em;
  z-index: 10;
}
.scrollination a.active:after {
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
}
.scrollination a {
  display: block;
  width: 110px;
  height: 25px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  color: #fff;
  position: relative;
  padding: 4px;
}
.scrollination a:after {
  -webkit-transition:box-shadow 0.5s ease;
  transition:box-shadow 0.5s ease;
  width:12px;
  height:12px;
  display: block;
  border:2px solid;
  border-radius:50%;
  content:'';
  position: absolute;
  margin:auto;
  top:0;
  right:4px;
  bottom:0;
}
.scrollination a .hover-text {
  position: absolute;
  right: 20px;
  top: -5px;
  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
  padding: 0 5px;
  background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
  text-decoration: underline;
  margin-right: 5px;
}
.scrollination a:hover .hover-text {
  opacity: 1;
}

.cookie-popup.position-bottom {
	bottom: 0;
	/*box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);*/
}
.cookie-popup {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	left: 0;
	/*z-index: 1000;*/
	right: 0;
	/*width: 100%;
	background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);*/
	color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	font-family: 'Roboto', 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	z-index: 10001;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-inner {
	/*display: table;
	width: 100%;*/
	border-radius: 5px;
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 0 auto;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	padding: 5px 10px;
	position: relative;
	min-height: 24px;
	font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', helvetica, arial, sans-serif;
	font-size: 13px;
	line-height: 24px;
	box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
}
.cookie-popup-left {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 0px;
}
.cookie-popup-headline {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.cookie-popup-sub-headline {
	font-size: 14px;
}
.cookie-popup-right {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-right .close {
	/*position: relative;
	top: -15px;
	left: 0px;*/
	font-size: 16px;
	opacity: 0.5;
}

	}
}*/










function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");
	//console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
	document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

function getQueryStringValue(key) {
	return unescape(window.location.search.replace(new RegExp("^(?:.*[&\\?]" + escape(key).replace(/[\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "(?:\\=([^&]*))?)?.*$", "i"), "$1"));
}
jQuery(function() {
	if (getQueryStringValue("ref") == 'form') {
		jQuery(".show-before-form-submit").hide();
		jQuery(".show-after-form-submit").show();
	}
});




font.text1 {
	margin: 10px 0px;
	display: block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 700;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0px 50px 5px 0px;
}
font.text1 a {
	color: royalblue;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
font.text1 a:hover {
	color: dodgerblue;
}
.login_logoff {
	display: -webkit-box;/* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
	display: -moz-box; /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
	display: -ms-flexbox;/* TWEENER - IE 10 */
	display: -webkit-flex; /* NEW - Chrome */
	display: flex; /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */
	flex-direction: row-reverse;
	-webkit-flex-direction: row-reverse;
}
a.text1 {
	font-size: 30px;
	margin: 0 5px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
	.scroll_div {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
.scroll_div {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0px;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 9999;
	text-align: center;
}
.scroll_div .category {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.scroll_div .category#parents {
	background-color: rgba(255, 121, 48, 0.88);
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container {
	display: inline-block;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 799px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 13%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) and (max-width:1211px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 10px;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1212px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 20px;
	}
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container .more {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 1.3em;
	margin: 0px !important;
	line-height: 20px !important;
}
.scroll_div .category#schools {
	background-color: #00AD00;
}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}
.scroll_div .category p {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: Calibri;
	color: #fff;
}
.scroll_div .category p.parents,
.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {
	margin: -5px 0px 2px;
	font-size: 24px;
	font-weight: 700;
}
.scroll_div .category p a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	border: 2px solid #fff;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: none;
	transition: background-color 0.5s ease, border 0.5s ease;
}
.scroll_div .category p a:hover {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #fff;
	border: 2px solid white;
}
#formc {
	

	height: 25px;
}
#edsearch {
	width: 75px;
	height: 25px;
	padding: 2px;
}
@media screen and (min-width : 320px) and (max-width :480px) {
.requestdemo1 { display: none;}
.loginform { float: right; margin-top: 35px;}
.headerLogo { width: 50%; float: left;}
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: -15px;}
#formc {margin-left: 10px;}
#edsearch {margin-right: -200px; margin-top: -55px;}
.headerRightArea .navbar-form.navbar-left { display: none; }
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'], div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] > div { display: none; }
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: 0px !important; }
#search_bar { display: none !important; }
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
.flex-on-mobile {
align-items: center;
text-align: center;
margin: 0 auto;
display: flex;	
}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
#formc {

width:150px;

}
.flex-on-mobile .form-group{

margin-top:10px;
}
.loginform {
margin-left:30px;
}
#edsearch {
margin-left:5px;
margin-bottom:0px;
}
}

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

	font-size: 14px;
}
.cookie-popup-right {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-right .close {
	/*position: relative;
	top: -15px;
	left: 0px;*/
	font-size: 16px;
	opacity: 0.5;
}
/*@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
	.cookie-popup-left {
		display: block;
	}
	.cookie-popup-right {
		display: block;
		text-align: center;
	}
}*/










function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");
	//console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
	document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

function getQueryStringValue(key) {
	return unescape(window.location.search.replace(new RegExp("^(?:.*[&\\?]" + escape(key).replace(/[\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "(?:\\=([^&]*))?)?.*$", "i"), "$1"));
}

	}
});




font.text1 {
	margin: 10px 0px;
	display: block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 700;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0px 50px 5px 0px;
}
font.text1 a {
	color: royalblue;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
font.text1 a:hover {
	color: dodgerblue;
}
.login_logoff {
	display: -webkit-box;/* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
	display: -moz-box; /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
	display: -ms-flexbox;/* TWEENER - IE 10 */
	display: -webkit-flex; /* NEW - Chrome */
	display: flex; /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */
	flex-direction: row-reverse;
	-webkit-flex-direction: row-reverse;
}
a.text1 {
	font-size: 30px;
	margin: 0 5px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
	.scroll_div {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
.scroll_div {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0px;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 9999;
	text-align: center;
}
.scroll_div .category {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.scroll_div .category#parents {
	background-color: rgba(255, 121, 48, 0.88);
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container {
	display: inline-block;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 799px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 13%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) and (max-width:1211px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 10px;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1212px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 20px;
	}
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container .more {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 1.3em;
	margin: 0px !important;
	line-height: 20px !important;
}
.scroll_div .category#schools {
	background-color: #00AD00;
}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}
.scroll_div .category p {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: Calibri;
	color: #fff;
}
.scroll_div .category p.parents,
.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {
	margin: -5px 0px 2px;
	font-size: 24px;
	font-weight: 700;
}
.scroll_div .category p a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	border: 2px solid #fff;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: none;
	transition: background-color 0.5s ease, border 0.5s ease;
}
.scroll_div .category p a:hover {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #fff;
	border: 2px solid white;
}
#formc {
	

	height: 25px;
}
#edsearch {
	width: 75px;
	height: 25px;
	padding: 2px;
}

.requestdemo1 { display: none;}
.loginform { float: right; margin-top: 35px;}
.headerLogo { width: 50%; float: left;}
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: -15px;}
#formc {margin-left: 10px;}
#edsearch {margin-right: -200px; margin-top: -55px;}
.headerRightArea .navbar-form.navbar-left { display: none; }
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'], div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] > div { display: none; }
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: 0px !important; }
#search_bar { display: none !important; }
}

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

.product-box {
border: 1px solid #eee;
float: left;
webkit-box-shadow: 0px 8px 12px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
   box-shadow: 0px 8px 12px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
margin: 4px 4px 4px 20px;
position: relative;
width: 150px !important;
padding: 4px;
font-family: Helvetica;
height: 244px  !important;
padding-left:6px;
padding-right:6px;

}
.a-icon-shop-now {
   left: 2px;
   top: 2px;
   position: absolute;
   height: 25px;
   width: 25px;
   background: 0;
   display: inline-block;
   vertical-align: top;
}
a-button-primary {
   border-color: #cba957 #bf942a #aa8326;
   background: #f0c14b;
}
.a-button-inner {
   position: relative;
   height: 100%;
   overflow: hidden;
   -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
   -moz-border-radius: 3px;
   border-radius: 3px;
   text-align: center;
   cursor: pointer;
   display: block;
}
.a-button-input {
   position: absolute;
   z-index: 20;
   height: 100%;
   width: 100%;
   left: 0;
   top: 0;
   background-color: #fff;
   outline: 0;
   border: 0;
   overflow: visible;
   cursor: pointer;
   opacity: .01;
   filter: alpha(opacity=1);
}
.a-button-text {
   position: relative;
   z-index: 10;
   color: #111;
   font-size: 12px;
   text-align: center;
   line-height: 29px;
   display: block;
   font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
   white-space: nowrap;
   background-color: transparent;
   margin: 0;
   border: 0;
   outline: 0;
   padding: 0 2px 0 29px;
}
.a-button {
background: #d8dde6;
display: block;
padding: 0;
vertical-align: middle;
height: 31px;
*height: 29px;
border: 1px solid;
border-color: #bcc1c8 #bababa #adb2bb;
text-align: center;
overflow: hidden;
text-decoration: none!important;
cursor: pointer;
-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
-moz-border-radius: 3px;
border-radius: 3px;
width: 100%;
box-sizing: border-box;
margin-top: 11px;
}
input#searched_text {
border-radius:15px 15px 15px 15px;
   padding: 10px 10px 10px 12px;
   font-size: 20px;
   height: 35px;
   width: 95%;
   margin: 10px 0px 36px 50px;
}
.a-icon-cart {
left: 2px;
top: 2px;
position: absolute;
height: 25px;
width: 25px;
background-position: -35px -5px;
background-image: url(../images/amzn-sprite.png);
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-size: 400px 600px;
-webkit-background-size: 400px 600px;
display: inline-block;
vertical-align: top;
}
.a-button-text.centered {
padding: 0 2px;
}
.a-button-primary {
border-color: #cba957 #bf942a #aa8326;
background: #f0c14b;
}

.a-button-primary:active {
border-color: #aa8326 #bf942a #bf942a;
}

.a-button-primary:hover {
border-color: #c59f43 #aa8326 #957321;
}

.a-button-primary:focus {
outline: 0;
border-color: #e47911;
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 3px rgba(228,121,17,.5);
-moz-box-shadow: 0 0 3px rgba(228,121,17,.5);
box-shadow: 0 0 3px rgba(228,121,17,.5);
}

.a-button-primary .a-button-inner {
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.4) inset;
-moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.4) inset;
box-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.4) inset;
background-color: #f7dfa5;
background: -webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom,from(#f7dfa5),to(#f0c14b));
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#f7dfa5,#f0c14b);
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#f7dfa5,#f0c14b);
background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#f7dfa5,#f0c14b);
background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#f7dfa5,#f0c14b);
background: #f3d078;
}
.lt-ie9 .a-button-primary .a-button-inner {
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#fff7dfa5', endColorstr='#fff0c14b', GradientType=0);
}

.a-button-primary:active .a-button-inner {
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
-moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2) inset;
background-color: #f0c14b;
background-image: none;
}

.lt-ie9 .a-button-primary:active .a-button-inner {
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(enabled=false);
}

.a-button-primary:hover .a-button-inner {
background-color: #f5d78e;
background: -webkit-gradient(linear,left top,left bottom,from(#f5d78e),to(#eeb933));
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,#f5d78e,#eeb933);
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,#f5d78e,#eeb933);
background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,#f5d78e,#eeb933);
background: -o-linear-gradient(top,#f5d78e,#eeb933);
background: #f1c860;
}


.lt-ie9 .a-button-primary:hover .a-button-inner {
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#fff5d78e', endColorstr='#ffeeb933', GradientType=0);
}

		$(document).ready(function(){
			var tilte="";
			var DetailUrl="";
			var bookImage="";
			var lprice="";
			var dataTitle="";
			$.ajax({
				type:"GET",
				url:'https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llp/amazon-product-api/amazon_product_listing.php?keyWords=1946795267&grade=3&pagenum=1',
				success:function(response){
					response = JSON.parse(response);
					var itemResult=''; 
					var item2='';
					if(response.Items.TotalResults != 0 && response.Items.TotalResults != ''){
							$.each(response.Items.Item,function(i,list){
                          // console.log("loop");
                           if(list.ItemAttributes.Title){
                             title=list.ItemAttributes.Title;
                              dataTitle=title.replace(/\[.*?\]/g, '');
                           }

                           if(list.DetailPageURL){
                           	DetailUrl=list.DetailPageURL;	
                           }
                           if(list.MediumImage.URL){
                           		bookImage=list.MediumImage.URL
                           }
                           if(list.OfferSummary.LowestNewPrice){
                              lprice=list.OfferSummary.LowestNewPrice;
                           }
                           
						});
						itemResult += '<div><p class="product-price"><h3>'+dataTitle+'</h3><br> </p></div>';
						item2 +='<div class="col-sm-3 col-xs-12 product-box"><a id="urllink" target="_blank" href="'+DetailUrl+'"><img id="imgformat" src="'+bookImage+'"></a><div class="product-title"><p class="product-price">'+lprice+'</p></div><div><span class="a-button a-button-primary"><a target="_blank" href="'+DetailUrl+'" style="text-decoration:none"><span class="a-button-inner"><img src="https://webservices.amazon.com/scratchpad/assets/images/Amazon-Favicon-64x64.png"  class="a-icon a-icon-shop-now"><input class="a-button-input" type="submit" value="Add to cart"><span class="a-button-text">Shop Now</span></span></a></span></div></div>';
						$('#title-e').html(itemResult);
						$('.amazon-api-buy-e').html(item2);
        //$('#gadeHeading').html('<h4>Grade '+gradeval+' '+val+'</h4>');
    }
}
});

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");
	//console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
	document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

img.wp-smiley,
img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
	height: 1em !important;
	width: 1em !important;
	margin: 0 .07em !important;
	vertical-align: -0.1em !important;
	background: none !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
}






























@media screen and (max-width: 500px) {
  .caption {
   top: 20% !important;
position:relative;
  }}
.btn-danger2 {
      color: white;
      background-color: transparent;
  }
.btn-danger2:hover {
      color: white;
      background-color: rgb(235,124,129);
  }
.btn-danger1 {
      color: rgb(126,126,126);
      background-color: transparent;
border: 3px solid rgb(250,105,112);
  }
.btn-danger1:hover {
      color: white;
      background-color: rgb(235,124,129);
  }
.testimonial-inner p.testimonial-text::before {
    font-family: 'FontAwesome';
    content: "\f10d";
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding-right: 30px;
    font-weight: normal;
    color: rgb(66,173,226);
    display: initial;
}
.testimonial-inner p.testimonial-text::after {
    font-family: 'FontAwesome';
    content: "\f10e";
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding-left: 30px;
    font-weight: normal;
    color: rgb(66,173,226);
    display: initial;
}
.counter.counter-large {
    font-size: 30px;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-family: system-ui;
}
img {
    border: 0;
    /* max-width: 100%; */
    height: auto;
}
.caption {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 30%;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    color: #000;
}
.caption span.border {
    background-color: #111;
    color: #fff;
    padding: 18px;
    font-size: 25px;
    letter-spacing: 10px;
}
.parallax {
  /* The image used */
  background-image: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/header.png?x78814");

  /* Set a specific height */
  min-height: 663px; 

  /* Create the parallax scrolling effect */
  background-attachment: fixed;
  
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
}
ul {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    list-style: none;
text-align:left;
}
.intro {
  background: white;
  padding: 100px 0;
}

.container {
  width: 90%;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
 
}

h1 {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
}


/* TIMELINE
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– */

.timeline ul {
  <!--background: rgb(66,165,245);-->
  padding: 50px 0;
}

.timeline ul li {
  list-style-type: none;
  position: relative;
  width: 6px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding-top: 50px;
  background: #fff;
}

.timeline ul li::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  left: 50%;
  bottom: 0;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background: inherit;
}

.timeline ul li div {
  position: relative;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 400px;
  padding: 15px;
  background: white;
}

.timeline ul li div::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 7px;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  border-style: solid;
}

.timeline ul li:nth-child(odd) div {
  left: 45px;
}

.timeline ul li:nth-child(odd) div::before {
  left: -15px;
  border-width: 8px 16px 8px 0;
  border-color: transparent white transparent transparent;
}

.timeline ul li:nth-child(even) div {
  left: -439px;
}

.timeline ul li:nth-child(even) div::before {
  right: -15px;
  border-width: 8px 0 8px 16px;
  border-color: transparent transparent transparent white;
}

time {
  display: block;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}


/* EFFECTS
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– */

.timeline ul li::after {
  transition: background .5s ease-in-out;
}

.timeline ul li.in-view::after {
  background: #F45B69;
}

.timeline ul li div {
  visibility: hidden;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: all .5s ease-in-out;
}

.timeline ul li:nth-child(odd) div {
  transform: translate3d(200px, 0, 0);
}

.timeline ul li:nth-child(even) div {
  transform: translate3d(-200px, 0, 0);
}

.timeline ul li.in-view div {
  transform: none;
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
}


/* GENERAL MEDIA QUERIES
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– */

@media screen and (max-width: 900px) {
  .timeline ul li div {
    width: 250px;
  }
  .timeline ul li:nth-child(even) div {
    left: -289px;
    /*250+45-6*/
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  .timeline ul li {
    margin-left: 20px;
  }
  .timeline ul li div {
    width: calc(100vw - 91px);
  }
  .timeline ul li:nth-child(even) div {
    left: 45px;
  }
  .timeline ul li:nth-child(even) div::before {
    left: -15px;
    border-width: 8px 16px 8px 0;
    border-color: transparent white transparent transparent;
  }
}


.our-team-section {
    position: relative;
    padding-top: 40px;
    padding-bottom: 40px;
}
.our-team-section:before {
    position: absolute;
    top: -0;
    left: 0;
    content: " ";
    background: url(img/service-section-bottom.png);
    background-size: 100% 100px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100px;
    float: left;
    z-index: 99;
}
.our-team {
    padding: 30px 0 40px;
    background: #f9f9f9;
    text-align: center;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
    border-bottom: 5px solid #00325a;
}
.our-team:hover{
    border-bottom: 5px solid #2f2f2f;
}

.our-team .pic{
    display: inline-block;
    width: 130px;
    height: 130px;
    margin-bottom: 50px;
    z-index: 1;
    position: relative;
}
.our-team .pic:before {
    content: "";
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: #00325a;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 135%;
    right: 0;
    left: 0;
    opacity: 1;
    transform: scale(3);
    transition: all 0.3s linear 0s;
}
.our-team:hover .pic:before{
 height: 100%;
    background: #2f2f2f; 
 }
.our-team .pic:after {
    content: "";
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: #ffffff00;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 1;
    transition: all 0.3s linear 0s;
}
.our-team:hover .pic:after{
    background: #7ab92d;
}
.our-team .pic img {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    border-radius: 50%;
    transform: scale(1);
    transition: all 0.9s ease 0s;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 14px #f7f5ec;
    transform: scale(0.7);
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
}
.our-team:hover .pic img{
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 14px #f7f5ec;
    transform: scale(0.7);
}
.our-team .team-content{ margin-bottom: 30px; }
.our-team .title{
    font-size: 22px;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #4e5052;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    text-transform: capitalize;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
}
.our-team .post{
    display: block;
    font-size: 15px;
    color: #4e5052;
    text-transform:capitalize;
}
.our-team .social{
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    background: #2f2f2f;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -100px;
    left: 0;
    transition: all 0.5s ease 0s;
}
.our-team:hover .social{ bottom: 0; }
.our-team .social li{ display: inline-block; }
.our-team .social li a{
    display: block;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 17px;
    color: #fff;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
}
.our-team .social li a:hover{
    color: #2f2f2f;
    background: #f7f5ec;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 990px){
    .our-team{ margin-bottom: 30px; }
}

  font: normal 16px/26px Open Sans Condensed, sans-serif;
  color: #fff;

.block {
  z-index: 1;
  position: relative;
  &:before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    height: calc(100% - 40px);
    width: 1px;
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    left: 50%;
    margin-top: 90px;

.title {
  font: bold 42px/52px Open Sans Condensed, sans-serif;

}

.each-event {
  background-color: #f4f4f4;
  color: #777;
  padding: 15px;
  margin: 60px 20px;
  width: 500px;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
  &:before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: calc(50% - 8px);
    left: -27px;
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 20px -4px rgba(64, 64, 64, 0.8);
  }
  &:nth-child(odd) {
    margin-left: calc(50% + 20px);
  }
  &:nth-child(even) {
    margin-left: calc(50% - 521px);
    &:before {
      left: calc(100% + 14px);
    }
  }
}

.title.non-focus {

}

  &:before {
    opacity: 0;
    background-color: #aaa;
  }
}

/* The Modal (background) */
.modal {
  display: none; /* Hidden by default */
  position: fixed; /* Stay in place */
  padding-top: 50px; /* Location of the box */
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%; /* Full width */
  height: 100%; /* Full height */
  overflow: auto; /* Enable scroll if needed */
  background-color: rgb(0,0,0); /* Fallback color */
  background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4); /* Black w/ opacity */
}

/* Modal Content */
.modal-content {
  position: relative;
  background-color: #fefefe;
  margin: auto;
  padding: 0;
  border: 1px solid #888;
  width: 80%;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2),0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.19);
  -webkit-animation-name: animatetop;
  -webkit-animation-duration: 0.4s;
  animation-name: animatetop;
  animation-duration: 0.4s
}

/* Add Animation */
@-webkit-keyframes animatetop {
  from {top:-300px; opacity:0} 
  to {top:0; opacity:1}
}

@keyframes animatetop {
  from {top:-300px; opacity:0}
  to {top:0; opacity:1}
}

/* The Close Button */
.close {
  color:black;
  float: right;
  font-size: 28px;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.close:hover,
.close:focus {
  color: #000;
  text-decoration: none;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.modal-header1 {
  padding: 0px 16px;
  background-color: #5cb85c;
  color: white;
}

.modal-body {padding: 2px 16px;}

.modal-footer {
  padding: 2px 16px;
  background-color: #5cb85c;
  color: white;
}

.mySlides {display: none}
img {vertical-align: middle;}

/* Slideshow container */
.slideshow-container {
  max-width: 1000px;
  position: relative;
  margin: auto;
}

/* Next & previous buttons */
.prev, .next {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  width: auto;
  padding: 16px;
  margin-top: -22px;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 18px;
  transition: 0.6s ease;
  border-radius: 0 3px 3px 0;
  user-select: none;
}

/* Position the "next button" to the right */
.next {
  right: 0;
  border-radius: 3px 0 0 3px;
}

/* On hover, add a black background color with a little bit see-through */
.prev:hover, .next:hover {
  background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
}

/* Caption text */
.text {
  color: #f2f2f2;
  font-size: 15px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 8px;
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Number text (1/3 etc) */
.numbertext {
  color: #f2f2f2;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
}

/* The dots/bullets/indicators */
.dot {
  cursor: pointer;
  height: 10px;
  width: 10px;
  margin: 0 2px;
  background-color: #bbb;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background-color 0.6s ease;
}

.active, .dot:hover {
  background-color: #717171;
}

/* Fading animation */
]

@-webkit-keyframes fade {
  from {opacity: .4} 
  to {opacity: 1}
}

@keyframes fade {
  from {opacity: .4} 
  to {opacity: 1}
}

/* On smaller screens, decrease text size */
@media only screen and (max-width: 300px) {
  .prev, .next,.text {font-size: 11px}
}

  .learningResource-list ul { margin:0; padding:0; list-style:none; }
  .learningResource-list ul li { position:relative; padding:0 0 0px 37px; }
  .learningResource-list ul li:before { font-family:'FontAwesome'; content:'\f05d'; color:aqua; position:absolute; left:0; top:2px; font-size:30px;font-weight: 100; }
  .learningResource-list strong { display:block; font-size:22px; line-height:30px; padding:0 0 15px; }
  .learningResource-list ul li:nth-child(2n):before {color: aqua;font-weight: 100; }
  .learningResource-list ul li:nth-child(3n):before {     color: aqua;font-weight: 100; }
  .learningResource-list ul li:nth-child(4n):before { color: aqua;font-weight: 100; }
  .learningResource-list + .learningResource-list ul li:first-child:before { color:yellow; }
  .learningResource-list + .learningResource-list ul li:nth-child(2n):before { color:yellow; }
  .learningResource-list + .learningResource-list ul li:nth-child(3n):before { color:yellow; }
.learningResource-list + .learningResource-list ul li:nth-child(4n):before { color:yellow); }

    .parallax1 > use {
      animation: move-forever1 10s linear infinite;
      &:nth-child(1) {
        animation-delay: -2s;
      }
    }
    .parallax2 > use {
      animation: move-forever2 8s linear infinite;
      &:nth-child(1) {
        animation-delay: -2s;
      }
    }
    .parallax3 > use {
      animation: move-forever3 6s linear infinite;
      &:nth-child(1) {
        animation-delay: -2s;
      }
    }
    .parallax4 > use {
      animation: move-forever4 4s linear infinite;
      &:nth-child(1) {
        animation-delay: -2s;
      }
    }
    @keyframes move-forever1 {
      0% {
        transform: translate(85px, 0%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
      }
    }
    @keyframes move-forever2 {
      0% {
        transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translate(85px, 0%);
      }
    }
    @keyframes move-forever3 {
      0% {
        transform: translate(85px, 0%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
      }
    }
    @keyframes move-forever4 {
      0% {
        transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
      }
      100% {
        transform: translate(85px, 0%);
      }
    }

      .scrollination {
        position: fixed;
        top: 50%;
        right: 20px;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
        font-size: 1.4em;
        z-index: 10;
      }

      .scrollination a.active:after {
        box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
      }

      .scrollination a {
        display: block;
        width: 110px;
        height: 25px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        color: #fff;
        position: relative;
        padding: 4px;
      }

      .scrollination a:after {
        -webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
        transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
        width: 12px;
        height: 12px;
        display: block;
        border: 2px solid;
        border-radius: 50%;
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        margin: auto;
        top: 0;
        right: 4px;
        bottom: 0;
      }

      .scrollination a .hover-text {
        position: absolute;
        right: 20px;
        top: -5px;
        opacity: 0;
        -webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
        transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
        padding: 0 5px;
        background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
        text-decoration: underline;
        margin-right: 5px;
      }

    .div-transparent:before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 5%;
      right: 5%;
      width: 90%;
      height: 1px;
      background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, rgb(48, 49, 51), transparent);
    }

    .div-arrow-down:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 1;
      top: -7px;
      left: calc(50% - 7px);
      width: 14px;
      height: 14px;
      transform: rotate(45deg);
      background-color: white;
      border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
      border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
    }

    .div-tab-down:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 1;
      top: 0;
      left: calc(50% - 10px);
      width: 50px;
      height: 24px;

      background-color: white;
      border-bottom: 1px solid white;
      border-left: 1px solid white;
      border-right: 1px solid white;
      border-radius: 0 0 38px 38px;
    }

    .div-stopper:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 1;
      top: -6px;
      left: calc(50% - 7px);
      width: 14px;
      height: 12px;
      background-color: white;
      border-left: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
      border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
    }

    .div-dot:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 1;
      top: -9px;
      left: calc(50% - 9px);
      width: 18px;
      height: 18px;
      background-color: rgb(35, 161, 219);
      border: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
      border-radius: 50%;
      box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px white,
        0 0 0 4px white;
    }

WHO ARE WE




At Lumos, we offer engaging learning programs developed by expert teachers, caring parents, and innovative engineers to improve student achievement on state assessments. The Lumos StepUp program increases student learning outcomes by offering realistic assessment rehearsal along with path-breaking AI-powered remedial practice. 


With our digital learning solutions, students are equipped with all the necessary resources to support all-year self-paced learning anytime, anywhere.


We pride in our ability to create custom solutions specifically designed to meet individual school districts’ needs. Using our standards-aligned learning programs, educators can help students succeed in high-stakes assessments and significantly improve school rankings.

OUR STORY


“They say necessity is the mother of invention!”
 Each necessity, however big or small, drives one to come up with innovative solutions. As is the case of Mukunda Krishnaswamy, he found it hard to gather the right resources while his son was preparing for the state assessments. He realized that the problem was deep and didn’t have a viable solution, and that’s how a company was born: 
Lumos Learning
. 


Our story began in 2007; we started from a car shed with a team of 3 by providing test preparation solutions to a handful of schools in the United States. 


Today, we are one of the most loved edTech platforms, empowering over 
370,000 students, 53,000 teachers, and 26,000 schools
 to support K-12 students achieve academic excellence.



































OUR MISSION


"At Lumos Learning, we believe in being there when a student needs that extra help – as a teacher, as a parent.
    

    So, we are working diligently to build an empathetic learning platform that nurtures student achievement." 




Our Vision



"To create innovative and efficient learning solutions to support the paradigm shift in the education system"























 OUR VALUES








Reach everyone. Teach everyone 












Student is at the heart of everything we do 












Collaborative spirit to impact positive outcomes 














Connected Education Community 












Connected Education Community 












Support personalized learning for every learner

OUR PEOPLE


At Lumos Learning, 
we foster a uniquely collaborative culture
 full of passionate people who care more about students’ success.


Our emphasis on teamwork, trust, and tolerance for diverging opinions helps us focus on new opportunities and building better capabilities. 
Together, we achieve results that bridge what is with what can be
.


Our squad comprises thought leaders and some of the best young talents from diverse backgrounds, including expert educators, caring parents, marketers, spearheaded engineers with a growth mindset 
committed to solving pressing problems in education
.


Our people are our real source of growth and innovation!
