var $animation_elements = $('.animation-element');
var $window = $(window);

function check_if_in_view() {
  var window_height = $window.height();
  var window_top_position = $window.scrollTop();
  var window_bottom_position = (window_top_position + window_height);
 
  $.each($animation_elements, function() {
    var $element = $(this);
    var element_height = $element.outerHeight();
    var element_top_position = $element.offset().top;
    var element_bottom_position = (element_top_position + element_height);
 
    //check to see if this current container is within viewport
    if ((element_bottom_position >= window_top_position) &&
        (element_top_position <= window_bottom_position)) {
      $element.addClass('in-view');
    } else {
      $element.removeClass('in-view');
    }
  });
}

$window.on('scroll resize', check_if_in_view);
$window.trigger('scroll');



var $element=$('.each-event, .title');
var $window = $(window);
$window.on('scroll resize', check_for_fade);
$window.trigger('scroll');
function check_for_fade() { 
    var window_height = $window.height();
    
    $.each($element, function (event) {
        var $element = $(this);
        var element_height = $element.outerHeight();
        var element_offset = $element.offset().top;
        space = window_height - (element_height + element_offset -$(window).scrollTop());
        if (space < 60) {
            $element.addClass("non-focus");
        } else {
            $element.removeClass("non-focus");
        }
 
    });
};



  (function() {

  'use strict';

  // define variables
  var items = document.querySelectorAll(".timeline li");

  // check if an element is in viewport
  // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/123999/how-to-tell-if-a-dom-element-is-visible-in-the-current-viewport
  function isElementInViewport(el) {
    console.log(el);
    var rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
    return (
      rect.top >= 0 &&
      rect.left >= 0 &&
      rect.bottom <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) /*&& rect.right <= (window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth)*/
    );
  }

  function callbackFunc() {
    for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
      if (isElementInViewport(items[i])) {
        items[i].classList.add("in-view");
      }
    }
  }

  // listen for events
  window.addEventListener("load", callbackFunc);
  window.addEventListener("resize", callbackFunc);
  window.addEventListener("scroll", callbackFunc);

})();

.cookie-popup.position-bottom {
	bottom: 0;
	/*box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);*/
}
.cookie-popup {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	left: 0;
	/*z-index: 1000;*/
	right: 0;
	/*width: 100%;
	background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);*/
	color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	font-family: 'Roboto', 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	z-index: 10001;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-inner {
	/*display: table;
	width: 100%;*/
	border-radius: 5px;
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 0 auto;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	padding: 5px 10px;
	position: relative;
	min-height: 24px;
	font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', helvetica, arial, sans-serif;
	font-size: 13px;
	line-height: 24px;
	box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
}
.cookie-popup-left {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 0px;
}
.cookie-popup-headline {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.cookie-popup-sub-headline {
	font-size: 14px;
}
.cookie-popup-right {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-right .close {
	/*position: relative;
	top: -15px;
	left: 0px;*/
	font-size: 16px;
	opacity: 0.5;
}
/*@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
	.cookie-popup-left {
		display: block;
	}
	.cookie-popup-right {
		display: block;
		text-align: center;
	}
}*/










function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");
	//console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
	document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

            .suborder { 
        border: 4px dotted dodgerblue !important; 
        padding: 0;
        height:538px;
      }
      .left_box {
        vertical-align: top;
        text-align: center;      
        color: white;
      }
      .left_box p {
        font-size: 18px;
      }

      #leftbox_header h3 {
        color: white;
      }
      .control-label{
        font-size : 18px;
        font-weight:0px;
      }
      #paymentFrm .form-control{
        font-size: 14px;
        letter-spacing: normal;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased!important;
        text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
        font-weight: 500;

      .stepwizard-row:before {
        background-color: #fff !important;
      }

      .stepwizard-step p { margin-top: 10px; }

      .stepwizard-row { display: table-row; }

      .stepwizard { display: table; width: 100%; position: relative; }

      .stepwizard-step button[disabled] { opacity: 1 !important; filter: alpha(opacity=100) !important; }

      .stepwizard-row:before { top: 14px; bottom: 0; position: absolute; content: " "; width: 100%; height: 1px; background-color: #ccc; z-order: 0; }

      .stepwizard-step { display: table-cell; text-align: center; position: relative; }

      .btn-circle { width: 30px; height: 30px; text-align: center; padding: 6px 0; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.428571429; border-radius: 15px; } 

      .setup-content .form-group div { padding:0; color: #9c9a99; } 

      .setup-content .form-group input { color: Black; } 

    .form-group label { padding:0; color: #9c9a99; }

      .credit-card-box .panel-title { display: inline; font-weight: bold; } 

      .credit-card-box .form-control.error { border-color: red; outline: 0; box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.075),0 0 8px rgba(255,0,0,0.6); }

      .credit-card-box label.error { font-weight: bold; color: red; padding: 2px 8px; margin-top: 2px; }

      .credit-card-box .payment-errors { font-weight: bold; padding: 2px 8px;}

      .credit-card-box label { display: block; }

      .credit-card-box .display-table { display: table; }

      .credit-card-box .display-tr { display: table-row; }

      .credit-card-box .display-td { display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle; width: 50%; }

      .credit-card-box .panel-heading img { min-width: 180px; }
    
    .panel{
      border: unset;
        border-radius: unset;
      -webkit-box-shadow: unset;
        box-shadow: unset;
    }

      .nav-tabs.wizard {
        background-color: transparent;
        padding: 0;
        width: 100%;
        margin: 1em auto;
        border-radius: .25em;
        clear: both;
        border-bottom: none;
      }

      .nav-tabs.wizard li {
        width: 100%;
        float: none;
        margin-bottom: 3px;
      }

     .nav-tabs.wizard li>* {
        background-color: ghostwhite;
      }

      .nav-tabs.wizard li.completed>* {
        color: #fff !important;
       /* background-color: #3c763d !important;
        border-color: #3c763d !important; */
        border-bottom: none !important;
      }

     /* .nav-tabs.wizard li.active>* {
        color: #fff !important;
        background-color: #18bb70 !important;
        border-color: #18bb70 !important;
        border-bottom: none !important;
      }*/

      .nav-tabs.wizard li::after:last-child {
        border: none;
      }

      .nav-tabs.wizard > li > a {
        opacity: 1;
        font-size: 14px;
      }

      .nav-tabs.wizard a:hover {
        color: #fff;
        background-color: #2c3f4c;
        border-color: #2c3f4c
      }
      @media(min-width:452px) {

        .stepwizard { 
          display: table; 
          width: 100% !important; 
          position: relative;
        }

        .nav-tabs.wizard li {
          width: 50%;
          float: left;
        }
        .nav-tabs.wizard li.active a {
          padding-top: 15px;
        }
       /* .nav-tabs.wizard li::after,
        .nav-tabs.wizard li>*::after {
          content: '';
          position: absolute;
          top: 0px;
          left: 100%;
          height: 0;
          width: 0;
          border: 1.660em solid transparent;
          border-right-width: 0;
        }*/
        .nav-tabs.wizard li::after {
          z-index: 1;
          -webkit-transform: translateX(4px);
          -moz-transform: translateX(4px);
          -ms-transform: translateX(4px);
          -o-transform: translateX(4px);
          transform: translateX(4px);
          border-left-color: #fff;
          margin: -4px;
        }
       /* .nav-tabs.wizard li>*::after {
          z-index: 2;
          border-left-color: inherit
        }*/
        .nav-tabs.wizard > li:nth-of-type(1) > a {
          border-top-left-radius: 10px;
          border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
        }
        .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child a {
          border-top-right-radius: 10px;
          border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
        }
        .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child {
          margin-right: 0;
        }
        .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child a:after,
        .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child:after {
          content: "";
          border: none;
        }
        span.nmbr {
          display: block;
        }

            (function(){
        var lastActiveElement = document.activeElement;
        var time = 0;
        var stopTime = 10000;
        var intervalTime = 20;

        function _Check_For_Form_Validation(){
          if ( document.activeElement != lastActiveElement ){
            document.activeElement.blur();
            document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
            clearInterval( interval );
          }
          if ( time >= stopTime ){
            clearInterval( interval );
          }
        }

        var interval = setInterval( function(){
          time += intervalTime;
          _Check_For_Form_Validation();
        }, intervalTime);
      })();


$(document).ready(function(){
  var urlEmail=getParameterByName("email");
  if(urlEmail!=""){
    $("#firstemail").val(urlEmail);
  }
  var ask = $("#ask").text();
  var referrerURL =  encodeURIComponent(document.referrer);
  var currentURL =  encodeURIComponent($(location).attr('href'));
  $("#referrerURL").val(referrerURL);
  $("#currentURL").val(currentURL);

$('#payBtn').click(function(){
  var ask = $("#ask").text();
  var returnval = $("#livesearch_2").html();
  if (ask && returnval){
    searchopen = 1;
  }
  if(searchopen == 1){
    
    console.log(returnval);
    if(returnval == "No Suggestions."){
      if($('#yes').prop("checked") == false){
        alert("The school name is invalid. Please select another school name");
        $('#payBtn').attr("disabled","disabled");
      }
    }
  if($('#secondemail').val() == "" || $('#pname').val() == "" || $('#lname').val() == "" || $('#userstate').val() == "" || $('#snamefour').val() == ""){
    //alert("Please enter all the mandatory fields");
    if($('#secondemail').val() == ""){
    alert("Email cannot be empty");
      $('#secondemail').focus();
      return false;
    }else if($('#pname').val() == ""){
    alert("First Name cannot be empty");
      $('#pname').focus();
      return false;
    }else if($('#lname').val() == ""){
    alert("Last Name cannot be empty");
      $('#lname').focus();
      return false;
    }else if($('#userstate').val() == ""){
    alert("Please Select State");
      $('#userstate').focus();
    }else if($('#snamefour').val() == ""){
    alert("Student login name cannot be empty");
      $('#snamefour').focus();
    }
  }else{
  
  if($('#pname').val() != "" || $('#lname').val() != ""){

$(document).ready(function () {
  var navListItems = $('ul.setup-panel li a'),
  allWells = $('.setup-content'),
  allNextBtn = $('.nextBtn');

  allWells.hide();

  navListItems.click(function (e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    var $target = $($(this).attr('href')),
    $item = $(this);

    if (!$item.hasClass('disabled')) {
      allWells.hide();
      $target.show();
      $target.find('input:eq(0)').focus();
    }
  });
  
  allNextBtn.click(function(){
    var curStep = $(this).closest(".setup-content"),
    curStepBtn = curStep.attr("id"),
    nextStepWizard = $('ul.setup-panel li a[href="#' + curStepBtn + '"]').parent().next().children("a"),
    curInputs = curStep.find("input[type='text'],input[type='url']"),
    isValid = true;

    $(".form-group").removeClass("has-error");
    for(var i=0; i<curInputs.length; i++){
      if (!curInputs[i].validity.valid){
        isValid = false;
        $(curInputs[i]).closest(".form-group").addClass("has-error");

      }
    }

    if (isValid)
      nextStepWizard.removeAttr('disabled').trigger('click');
  });

  $('ul.setup-panel li a.btn-primary').trigger('click');
});

  function getParameterByName(name, url) {
     if (!url) url = window.location.href;
     name = name.replace(/[\[\]]/g, "\\$&");
     var regex = new RegExp("[?&]" + name + "(=([^&#]*)|&|#|$)"),
     results = regex.exec(url);
     if (!results) return null;
     if (!results[2]) return '';
     return decodeURIComponent(results[2].replace(/\+/g, " "));
     }

    function GetQueryStringParams(sParam) {
        var sPageURL = window.location.search.substring(1);
        var sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&');
        for (var i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
            var sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');
            if (sParameterName[0] == sParam) {
                return sParameterName[1];
            }
        }
    }

                              var showless = "<a style='font-size:12px;cursor:pointer;' id='hide'> SHOW LESS</a>";
                              fulldescp = full.concat(showless);
                            }
                          }
                          var img = response.image;
                          sessionStorage.setItem("image", img);
                          $('.tbimg').html('<img src="' + response.image + '"  height="50" width="50">');
                          $('.steptwonext').trigger('click');
                          $('#stepthree').html("");
                          $('#stepthree').html("<i class='fa fa-hourglass-start'></i>");
                          $('#steptwo').removeAttr("disabled");
                          $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events", "none");

                          $('#lithree').removeClass("active completed");
                          $('#litwo').removeClass("active completed");
                          $('#lione').removeClass("active completed");
                          $('#litwo').addClass("active");
                          //$('#lione').addClass("completed");
                          $('#lione').addClass("disabled");
                          //$("#stepone").addClass('disabled');
                          $("#stepone").css("pointer-events", "none");

                          $('#domain').val(response.domain);
                          $('#asscessType').val(response.asscessType);
                          $('#course').val(response.CourseID);
                          $('#subject').val(response.subject);
                          $('#grade').val(response.grade);
                          $('#orginalCode').val(response.orginalCode);
                          $('#assessment').val(response.assessment);
                          $('#assessCard').val(response.CardID);
                          $('#ReviewLink').val(response.ReviewLink);
                          var referrerURLF = encodeURIComponent(document.referrer);
                          var currentURLF = encodeURIComponent($(location).attr('href'));
                          $("#referrerURLF").val(referrerURLF);
                          $("#currentURLF").val(currentURLF);
                          $.each(response.statelist, function(i, item) {
                            $('#TBState').append("<option value='" + item.StateCode + "'>" + item.State + "</option>");
                          });
                          $("#descp").css("padding-top","0px");
                          $("#formdiv").css("position","unset");
                          $("#formdiv").css("top","0");
                          $('#step2img').css("display", "none");
                          //$('#invalidCode').css("display", "block");
                          $('#firstmargin').css("background", "ghostwhite");
                          $('#secmargin').css("background", "#e85353");
                          $('#secmargin').css("display", "block");
                          $('#firstimg').html('<img src="https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-145.png">');
                          $('#secimg').html('<img src="https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-146.png">');
                          //$('#forpadding').css("padding","0");
                          $('#stepone').css("padding","13px");
                          $('#stepone').css("color","#e85353");
                          $('#steptwo').css("color","#18bb70");
                          $('.acode_msg').css("display", "none");
                          var w = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.body.clientWidth;
                          if(w == 768){
                            $('.left_box').css({ 'height': '610px !important' });
                          }else if(w >= 320 && w <= 767){
                            $('.left_box').css("height","265px");
                            $('.newclass').css("height","700px");
                            $('#onlinedescp').css("display", "none");
                            $('#forpadding').css("padding","12px !important");
                            $(".infotab").removeClass("hidden-xs");
                            $(".infotab").addClass("visible-xs");
                            $("#forfading1").addClass("visible-xs");
                          }else{
                            $('.left_box').css({ 'height': '410px' }); 
                            $('.newclass').css("height","auto");
                          }
                          if (tpt_user != 'Y') {
                            if($('#asscessType').val() == "BPTs"){
                              $('#headingLabel').html("Register to access online resources included with your back to school tedBook <span id='headimg'><img src='https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-142.png' style='margin-left: 10px;'></span>");
                            }else if($('#asscessType').val() == "SLH"){
                              $('#headingLabel').html("Register to access online resources included with your summer learning tedBook <span id='headimg'><img src='https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-142.png' style='margin-left: 10px;'></span>");
                            }else if($('#asscessType').val() == "SKB"){
                              $('#headingLabel').html("Register to access online resources included with your skill builder tedBook <span id='headimg'><img src='https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-142.png' style='margin-left: 10px;'></span>");
                            }else if($('#asscessType').val() == "PTs"){
                              $('#headingLabel').html("Register to access online resources included with your "+response.subject+" tedBook <span id='headimg'><img src='https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-142.png' style='margin-left: 10px;'></span>");
                            }else if($('#asscessType').val() == "HS"){
                              if(response.grade == 3){
                                $('#headingLabel').html("Register to access online resources included with your curious reader tedBook <span id='headimg'><img src='https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-142.png' style='margin-left: 10px;'>");
                              }else{
                                $('#headingLabel').html("Register to access online resources included with your high school "+response.subject+" tedBook <span id='headimg'><img src='https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-142.png' style='margin-left: 10px;'></span>");
                              }
                            }else{
                              $('#headingLabel').html("Register to access online resources included with your tedBook <span id='headimg'><img src='https://dev.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Group-142.png' style='margin-left: 10px;'></span>");
                            }
                          }
                        }else{
                          $('#invalidCode').html('<i style="color:red;" class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove-sign"></i><strong>'+response.Error+'</strong>');
                          $('#invalidCode').css("display", "block");
                        }
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              }else{
                $('#invalidCode').html('<i style="color:red;" class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove-sign"></i><strong>'+response.Error+'</strong>');
                $('#invalidCode').css("display", "block");
              }
            }  
          });
        }
      }
    }
  });
  $(document).on('click', "#show", function() {
    $('#descp').html(fulldescp);
  });
  $(document).on('click', "#hide", function() {
    $('#descp').html(halfdescp);
  });
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
    var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
      c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
      return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
    }
    function finishAjax(id, response) {

        $('#' + id).html(unescape(response));
        $('#' + id).fadeIn(100);
    }

.button {
  display: inline-block;
  border-radius: 15px;
  background-color: #f4511e;
  border: none;
  color: #FFFFFF;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 28px;
  padding: 20px;
  transition: all 0.5s;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin: 5px;
width:105%;
}

.button span {
  cursor: pointer;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
  transition: 0.5s;
}

.button span:after {
  content: '\00bb';
  position: absolute;
  opacity: 0;
  top: 0;
  right: -20px;
  transition: 0.5s;
}

.button:hover span {
  padding-right: 25px;
}

.button:hover span:after {
  opacity: 1;
  right: 0;
}
.buy-now{
padding:14px 95px;
margin:70px;
}
.header-content h2{
color:white;
font-size:50px;
font-weight:bold;
margin-bottom:15px;
}
.header-content{
padding-top:30px;
}
.header-content li{
font-size:24px;
color:white;
line-height:10px;
font-weight:500px;
list-style-type:disc;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 768px) {
.header-content h2
{
    color: white;
    font-size: 33px;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
}
.header-content h1
{
    color: white;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 30px;
    padding-bottom: 20px!important;
}
.header-content{
padding-top:0px !important;
}
.grade-links{
margin-top:50px;
}
.buy-now{
margin-top:25px !important;
padding:10px 35px;
}

.header-content li{
font-size:16px !important;
line-height: 20px;
}
}

body {
	padding-top: 0px;
}
a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
iframe {
	max-width: 100% !important;
}
.navbar-header {
	float: none;
}
.navbar-inverse {
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	background: white;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	height: 70px;
	padding: 0;
}
.scroll-fixed-navbar.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	padding: 0px;
}
.logo_container {
	overflow-x: hidden;
}
.logo_container img {
	width: 70px;
}
.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
	padding: 5px 10px;
}
.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	font-size: 22px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus {
	color: rgb(30, 144, 255);
	background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.requestdemo1 {
	position: fixed;
	width: auto;
	right: 0px;
	top: 275px;
	z-index: 9999;
}
.requestdemo1 a {
	display: block;
}
.loginform {
	z-index: 100;
	margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
	height: 31px;
	overflow: hidden;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
}
.loginform a.login {
	height: 31px;
	width: 112px;
	text-indent: -9999px;
	display: block;
	background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/login_link_bg.png?x78814);
	margin: 0px auto;
}
.type-state-selection {
	margin: 7px 10px 0;
}
.type-state-selection.navbar-right.text-center a {
	margin-right: 10px;
}
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] {
	top: 105px !important;
}
.modal button.close {
	margin-top: -15px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
ul.homelinks li a.call-us {
	margin: 0px 0 0px;
	background: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/callus.png?x78814) no-repeat 8px 8px;
	border-top: 5px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
}
ul.homelinks li a {
	width: 100%;
	font-weight: normal;
	text-align: left;
	/* width: 301px; */
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	padding: 6px 0 9px 0px;
	display: block;
	margin: 0 0 0 0px;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
ul.homelinks li a span.head {
	font-size: 150%;
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	display: block;
}
ul.homelinks li a span {
	display: none;
	font-size: 100%;
	color: rgb(90, 100, 105);
	line-height: 1.5em;
	margin-left: 55px;
}
#requestDemoModal iframe {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
	.btn#edsearch {
		font-weight: 600;
		font-size: 16px;
	}
}

	color: white;
	font-size: 28px;
	font-weight: 800;
	margin-top: 10px;

	float: left;

height: 100%;*/

		width: 240px;

		display: inline-block;

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

section.section {

height: 100%;*/
	min-height: 85vh;

}

.scrollination {
	position: fixed;
	top: 50%;
	right: 20px;
	transform: translateY(-50%);
	font-size: 1.4em;
	z-index: 10;
}

.scrollination a.active:after {
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
}

.scrollination a {
	display: block;
	width: 110px;
	height: 25px;
	border-radius: 50%;
	color: #fff;
	position: relative;
	padding: 4px;
}

.scrollination a:after {
	-webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	width: 12px;
	height: 12px;
	display: block;
	border: 2px solid;
	border-radius: 50%;
	content: '';
	position: absolute;
	margin: auto;
	top: 0;
	right: 4px;
	bottom: 0;
}

.scrollination a .hover-text {
	position: absolute;
	right: 20px;
	top: -5px;
	opacity: 0;
	-webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	padding: 0 5px;
	background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	text-decoration: underline;
	margin-right: 5px;
}

.scrollination a:hover .hover-text {
	opacity: 1;
}

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

  .nav-tabs.wizard {
  background-color: transparent;
  padding: 0;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 1em auto;
  border-radius: .25em;
  clear: both;
  border-bottom: none;
}

.nav-tabs.wizard li {
  width: 100%;
  float: none;
  margin-bottom: 3px;
}

.nav-tabs.wizard li>* {
  position: relative;
  padding: 1em .8em .8em 2.5em;
  color: #999999;
  background-color: #dedede;
  border-color: #dedede;
}

.nav-tabs.wizard li.completed>* {
  color: #fff !important;
  background-color: #3c763d !important;
  border-color: #3c763d !important;
  border-bottom: none !important;
}

.nav-tabs.wizard li.active>* {
  color: #fff !important;
  background-color: #18bb70 !important;
  border-color: #18bb70 !important;
  border-bottom: none !important;
}

.nav-tabs.wizard li::after:last-child {
  border: none;
}

.nav-tabs.wizard > li > a {
  opacity: 1;
  font-size: 14px;
}

.nav-tabs.wizard a:hover {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #2c3f4c;
  border-color: #2c3f4c
}

@media(min-width:452px) {
  .nav-tabs.wizard li {
    position: relative;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 4px 4px 4px 0;
    width: 24.5%;
    float: left;
    text-align: center;
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard li.active a {
    padding-top: 15px;
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard li::after,
  .nav-tabs.wizard li>*::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0px;
    left: 100%;
    height: 0;
    width: 0;
    border: 1.660em solid transparent;
    border-right-width: 0;
    /*border-left-width: 20px*/
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard li::after {
    z-index: 1;
    -webkit-transform: translateX(4px);
    -moz-transform: translateX(4px);
    -ms-transform: translateX(4px);
    -o-transform: translateX(4px);
    transform: translateX(4px);
    border-left-color: #fff;
    margin: -4px;
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard li>*::after {
    z-index: 2;
    border-left-color: inherit
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard > li:nth-of-type(1) > a {
    border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child a {
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child {
    margin-right: 0;
  }
  .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child a:after,
  .nav-tabs.wizard li:last-child:after {
    content: "";
    border: none;
  }
  span.nmbr {
    display: block;
  }
}

function GetQueryStringParams(sParam) {
var sPageURL = window.location.search.substring(1);
var sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&');
for (var i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
  var sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');
  if (sParameterName[0] == sParam) {
    return sParameterName[1];
  }
}
}
/*function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
var d = new Date();
d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString();
document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires;
}*/
function setCookie(name, value, exdays, path, domain, secure){
var d = new Date();
d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
var expires = "expires="+d.toUTCString();
document.cookie= name + "=" + escape(value) +
((expires) ? ";"+ expires : "") +
("; path=/") +       //you having wrong quote here
((domain) ? "; domain=" + domain : "") +
((secure) ? "; secure" : "");
}
function getCookie(cname) {
var name = cname + "=";
var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
  var c = ca[i];
  while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
    c = c.substring(1);
  }
  if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
    return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
  }
}
return "";
}

  (function(){
    var lastActiveElement = document.activeElement;
    var time = 0;
    var stopTime = 10000;
    var intervalTime = 20;

    function _Check_For_Form_Validation(){
      if ( document.activeElement != lastActiveElement ){
        document.activeElement.blur();
        document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
        clearInterval( interval );
      }
      if ( time >= stopTime ){
        clearInterval( interval );
      }
    }

    var interval = setInterval( function(){
      time += intervalTime;
      _Check_For_Form_Validation();
    }, intervalTime);
  })();

    function stripeResponseHandler(status, response) {
      if (response.error) {
        $('#stepfour').html("");

          $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
          
          $('#output').html("<a href='/llp/login.php?check=yes&form_login="+tlogin+"&form_pass="+vmd+"' class='btn btn-lg btn-success' role='button' style='margin-bottom:10px;' target='_blank'>Teacher Login</a>"); 
          
          //$('#s1').css("display","block");

  $(document).ready(function(){
  var referrerURL =  encodeURIComponent(document.referrer);
    var currentURL =  encodeURIComponent($(location).attr('href'));
    
      $("#referrerURL").val(referrerURL);
      $("#currentURL").val(currentURL);
      $("#referrerURLFree").val(referrerURL);
      $("#currentURLFree").val(currentURL);
    $("#freeteacherAccount").click(function(){
    
    if(grecaptcha.getResponse() == "") {
      alert("Please check the Captcha to proceed");
      return false;
    } else {
      var fname = $('#inputFName').val();
      var lname = $('#inputLName').val();
      var email = $('#inputEmail').val();
      var state = $('#state').val();
      var schoolname = $('#school_search_1').val();
      var grade = $('#ftagrade').val();
      var subject = $('input[name=subject]:checked' ).val();
      
        
      
      var refUrl=$("#referrerURLFree").val();
        var curUrl=$("#currentURLFree").val();
      $.ajax({
      type:'POST',
      url:'/llp/create_stepup_demoaccount_json.php?fname='+fname+'&lname='+lname+'&email='+email+'&state='+state+'&school_name='+schoolname+'&grade='+grade+'&subject='+subject+'&currentURL='+curUrl+'&referral='+refUrl+'&user_type=teacher',
      
      success:function(response){
        
        var tlogin =response.userid;
        var password =response.pwd;
        
        sessionStorage.setItem("login", tlogin);
        sessionStorage.setItem("pass", password);
        sessionStorage.setItem("usertype", "freeteacher");

        window.location.href = '/llwp/lumos-stepup-subscription-successful.html?type=freeteacher';
      }
      });
      }
    });
    
    $('#firstcontent').click(function(){
      $('#first-tab').attr("style", "display: block !important");
      $('#second-tab').attr("style", "display: none !important");
    });
    $('#secondcontent').click(function(){
      $('#first-tab').attr("style", "display: none !important");
      $('#second-tab').attr("style", "display: block !important");
    });

    $('.steptwocheck').click(function(){
      
      if($('#emailfour').val() == " " || $('#emailfour').val() == null || $('#emailfour').val() == ""){
        $('#Infofour').css("display","block");
        $('#Infofour').html("<strong><i style='color:red;' class='glyphicon glyphicon-remove-sign'></i>Teacher Email cannot be empty</strong>");
        
      }
      
      var curStep = $(this).closest(".setup-content"),
        curStepBtn = curStep.attr("id"),
        nextStepWizard = $('ul.setup-panel li a[href="#' + curStepBtn + '"]').parent().next().children("a"),
        curInputs = curStep.find("input[type='text'],input[type='email']"),
        isValid = true;

      $(".form-group").removeClass("has-error");
      for(var i=0; i<curInputs.length; i++){
        if (!curInputs[i].validity.valid){
          isValid = false;
          $(curInputs[i]).closest(".form-group").addClass("has-error");
        }
      }
      if (isValid == true){
        
        $.post("/llp/stepup_parent_account_check_json.php", {
          usernames: $('#emailfour').val(),
        }, function(response){
          $('#Infofour').fadeOut();
          setTimeout("finishAjax('Infofour', '"+escape(response)+"')", 250);
          
          if((response.indexOf('Available') !== -1) && ($('#quantity').val() > 3)){
            $('#allowp').val('unset');
            
            var allowp = $('#allowp').val();
            if(allowp == 'unset'){
              $('.steptwocheck').removeClass("disabled");
              $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","auto");
              $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","auto");
              $('.steptwonext').trigger("click");
            }
          } else if(($('#quantity').val() < 4) &&(response.indexOf('Available') !== -1)){
        
            $('.steptwocheck').addClass("disabled");
            $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","none");
            $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
            $('#allowp').val('set');
          }else if((response.indexOf('Invalid') !== -1) && ($('#quantity').val() < 4)) {
            $('.steptwocheck').addClass("disabled");
            $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","none");
            $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
            $('#allowp').val('set');
          } else if((response.indexOf('exists') !== -1) && ($('#quantity').val() < 4)){
            $('.steptwocheck').addClass("disabled");
            $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","none");
            $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
            $('#allowp').val('set');
          }
          
        });
          
      }

    });
    $('.steponenext').click(function(){
      $('#stepfour').html("");
      $('#stepfour').html("<i class='fa fa-hourglass-start'></i>");
      
      $('#lione').removeClass("active completed");
      $('#litwo').removeClass("active completed");
      $('#lithree').removeClass("active completed");
      $('#lione').addClass("active");

      $('#stepfour').html("");

      $('#litwo').removeClass("active completed");
      $('#lione').removeClass("active completed");
      $('#litwo').addClass("active");
      $('#lione').addClass("completed"); 
      
    });
    $('.stepthreenext').click(function(){
      $('#stepfour').html("");

      $('#stepthree').removeClass("active completed");

      $('#lifour').removeClass("active completed");
      $('#lithree').removeClass("active completed");

      $('#lione').removeClass("active completed");
      $('#lifour').addClass("active");

    });
      $('#payBtn').click(function(){
      $("#steptwo").addClass('disabled');
      $("#steptwo").css("pointer-events","none");
      $("#stepone").addClass('disabled');
      $("#stepone").css("pointer-events","none");

    });

function showResult2() {
  var str = document.getElementById("school_search_2").value;
  var str1 = document.getElementById("statepayment").value;
  if (window.XMLHttpRequest) {
    // code for IE7+, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Safari
    xmlhttp=new XMLHttpRequest();
  } else {  // code for IE6, IE5
    xmlhttp=new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
  }
  if (str.length>1) {
    xmlhttp.onreadystatechange=function() {
      if (xmlhttp.readyState==4 && xmlhttp.status==200) {
        document.getElementById("livesearch_2").innerHTML=xmlhttp.responseText;
        document.getElementById('livesearch_2').style.display = "block";
        document.getElementById("livesearch_2").style.padding="5px";
        document.getElementById("livesearch_2").style.maxHeight="195px";
        document.getElementById("livesearch_2").style.overflowY="scroll";
        //document.getElementById("school_suggest").classList.add('hidden-school-content');
        //document.getElementById("school_suggest").style.content=" (Select a School from one of the suggestions)";
        //jQuery( 'html, body' ).scrollTop(2000);
        var div = document.getElementById("school_search_2");
        div.scrollIntoView(true);
      }
    }
    document.getElementById("livesearch_2").innerHTML='<img src="https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llp/loader2.gif?x78814&2246d4" />';
    xmlhttp.open("GET","/llp/livesearch.php?search1="+str+"&state="+str1,true);
    xmlhttp.send();
  }
}

}

  function emailCheck(){

  var usernames1 = $("#emailfour").val();
  if(usernames1.length > 1){
    if($("#emailfour").val() != $("#emailfourConfirm").val())
    {
      
      
      $('.steptwocheck').addClass("disabled");
      $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","none");
      $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
      $('#allowp').val('set');
      $('#InfofourConfirm').css("display","block");
      $('#InfofourConfirm').html('<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove-sign" style="color:red;font-size:18px;"></i> Email address does not match!');
    } else {
      
      $('#allowp').val('unset');
      var allowp = $('#allowp').val();
      if(allowp == 'unset'){
        $('.steptwocheck').removeClass("disabled");
        $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","auto");
        $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","auto");
      }
      $('#InfofourConfirm').css("display","block");
      $('#InfofourConfirm').html('<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-ok-sign" style="color:green;font-size:18px;"></i> Emails Match');
    }
    return false;
  } else {
    
    $('.steptwocheck').addClass("disabled");
    $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","none");
    $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
    $('#allowp').val('set');
    $('#InfofourConfirm').css("display","block");
    $('#InfofourConfirm').html('<i class="glyphicon glyphicon-remove-sign" style="color:red;font-size:18px;"></i> Email address does not match!');
    return false;
  }
  }
  function accountCheck(){

  var usernames1 = $("#emailfour").val();
  if(usernames1.length > 1){
    $.post("/llp/stepup_parent_account_check_json.php", {
      usernames: $('#emailfour').val(),
    }, function(response){
      $('#Infofour').fadeOut();
      setTimeout("finishAjax('Infofour', '"+escape(response)+"')", 250);
      
      if(response.indexOf('Available') !== -1){
        $('#allowp').val('unset');
        var allowp = $('#allowp').val();
        if(allowp == 'unset'){
          $('.steptwocheck').removeClass("disabled");
          $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","auto");
          $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","auto");
        }
      } else if(response.indexOf('Invalid') !== -1) {
        $('.steptwocheck').addClass("disabled");
        $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","none");
        $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
        $('#allowp').val('set');
      } else if(response.indexOf('exists') !== -1) {
        $('.steptwocheck').addClass("disabled");
        $('#steptwo').css("pointer-events","none");
        $('#stepthree').css("pointer-events","none");
        $('#allowp').val('set');
      }
      
    });
    return false;
  }
  }

  var usernames1 = $("#inputEmail").val();
  if(usernames1.length > 1){
    $.post("/llp/stepup_parent_account_check_json.php", {
      usernames: $('#inputEmail').val(),
    }, function(response){
      $('#Infofour1').fadeOut();
      setTimeout("finishAjax('Infofour1', '"+escape(response)+"')", 250);
      
    });
    return false;
  }
  }

  $('#'+id).fadeIn(100);

function numberWithCommas(x) {
  return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
}
$(document).ready(function() {
$.ajax({
url: "/llp/lumos_user_count_json.php",
type: "POST",
cache: false,
success: function(response) {
var response = response.result;
$(".schoolcount").html('<span>'+numberWithCommas(response.schoolcount)+'</span>');
$(".studentcount").html('<span>'+numberWithCommas(response.studentcount)+'</span>');
$(".teachercount").html('<span>'+numberWithCommas(response.teachercount)+'</span>');
}
});
});

img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;

body {
	padding-top: 0px;
}
a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
iframe {
	max-width: 100% !important;
}
.navbar-header {
	float: none;
}
.navbar-inverse {
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	background: white;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	height: 70px;
	padding: 0;
}
.scroll-fixed-navbar.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	padding: 0px;
}
.logo_container {
	overflow-x: hidden;
}
.logo_container img {
	width: 70px;
}
.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
	padding: 5px 10px;
}
.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	font-size: 22px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus {
	color: rgb(30, 144, 255);
	background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.requestdemo1 {
	position: fixed;
	width: auto;
	right: 0px;
	top: 275px;
	z-index: 9999;
}
.requestdemo1 a {
	display: block;
}
.loginform {
	z-index: 100;
	margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
	height: 31px;
	overflow: hidden;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
}
.loginform a.login {
	height: 31px;
	width: 112px;
	text-indent: -9999px;
	display: block;
	background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/login_link_bg.png?x78814);
	margin: 0px auto;
}
.type-state-selection {
	margin: 7px 10px 0;
}
.type-state-selection.navbar-right.text-center a {
	margin-right: 10px;
}
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] {
	top: 105px !important;
}
.modal button.close {
	margin-top: -15px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
ul.homelinks li a.call-us {
	margin: 0px 0 0px;
	background: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/callus.png?x78814) no-repeat 8px 8px;
	border-top: 5px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
}
ul.homelinks li a {
	width: 100%;
	font-weight: normal;
	text-align: left;
	/* width: 301px; */
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	padding: 6px 0 9px 0px;
	display: block;
	margin: 0 0 0 0px;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
ul.homelinks li a span.head {
	font-size: 150%;
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	display: block;
}
ul.homelinks li a span {
	display: none;
	font-size: 100%;
	color: rgb(90, 100, 105);
	line-height: 1.5em;
	margin-left: 55px;
}
#requestDemoModal iframe {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
	.btn#edsearch {
		font-weight: 600;
		font-size: 16px;
	}
}
.main_header {
	color: white;
	font-size: 28px;
	font-weight: 800;
	margin-top: 10px;
	padding: 0 40px;
}
.navbar-nav>li {
	float: left;
	padding-left: 30px;
}
.imgtopright {
	text-align: center;
}
section.section {
	/*min-height: 45rem;
height: 100%;*/
	min-height: 100vh;
	padding: 0 0 30px;
}
	@media (max-width: 409px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 240px;
	}
}

@media (min-width: 410px) and (max-width: 767px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 290px;
	}
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
	.navbar-form.navbar-left {
		float: left;
	}
	.navbar-form.navbar-left .form-group {
		display: inline-block;
		width: 55%;
	}
	.loginform.navbar-right.show-on-mobile {
		display: block;
		float: right;
	}
	.hide-on-mobile {
		display: none;
	}
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 340px;
	}
	.hide-on-mobile {
		display: block;
	}
	.show-on-mobile {
		display: none;
	}
	.loginform.navbar-right.hide-on-mobile {
		margin-right: 15px;
	}
}

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

.header-section {
	padding: 40px 0 20px 0;

}
.flex-align-center {

}

	height: auto;
}

}

	font-weight: 500;
}

	font-size: 18px;
}

}

	padding: 10px 10px 5px 20px;
}
.nav-previous a, .nav-previous-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid rgb(221, 221, 221);
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-previous a span, .nav-previous-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-previous a:hover, .nav-previous-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.nav-next a, .nav-next-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid #ddd;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-next a span, .nav-next-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-next a:hover, .nav-next-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.prev-post-text, .next-post-text {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	color: rgb(153, 153, 153);
}
p {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	line-height: 24px;
}
.comment_section {
	color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
}
#respond {
	margin-top: 1.07142857rem;
}
.required {
	color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
	font-size: 36px;
	vertical-align: text-top;
}
.nav-previous-post, .previous-post-image {
	display: block;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
	.comment_section {
		padding: 1.071428571rem 2.857142857rem;
		margin-top: 1.428571429rem;
		margin-bottom: 1.428571429rem;
		box-shadow: 0 0px 15px 3px rgb(153, 153, 153);
	}
}

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

  });

.header-section {
	padding: 40px 0 20px 0;
	background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);
}
#primary {
	margin: 30px auto;
}
.flex-align-center {
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
.author img {
	border-radius: 25%;
	border: 1px solid rgb(224, 224, 224);
}
h2.page-title {
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(224, 224, 224);
	padding-bottom: 20px;
	font-weight: 500;
}
.author-description h4 {
	font-weight: 500;
	font-size: 18px;
}
.nav-previous a, .nav-next a {
	padding: 10px;
}
.nav-previous-post a, .nav-next-post a {
	padding: 10px 10px 5px 20px;
}
.nav-previous a, .nav-previous-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid rgb(221, 221, 221);
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-previous a span, .nav-previous-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-previous a:hover, .nav-previous-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.nav-next a, .nav-next-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid #ddd;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-next a span, .nav-next-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-next a:hover, .nav-next-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.prev-post-text, .next-post-text {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	color: rgb(153, 153, 153);
}
p {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	line-height: 24px;
}
.comment_section {
	color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
}
#respond {
	margin-top: 1.07142857rem;
}
.required {
	color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
	font-size: 36px;
	vertical-align: text-top;
}
.nav-previous-post, .previous-post-image {
	display: block;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
	.comment_section {
		padding: 1.071428571rem 2.857142857rem;
		margin-top: 1.428571429rem;
		margin-bottom: 1.428571429rem;
		box-shadow: 0 0px 15px 3px rgb(153, 153, 153);
	}
}

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";

}

.scroll_div .category {

}

}

}

	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}

	}

		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}

	}

}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}

}

.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

font.text1 {
	margin: 10px 0px;
	display: block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 700;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0px 50px 5px 0px;
}
font.text1 a {
	color: royalblue;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
font.text1 a:hover {
	color: dodgerblue;
}
.login_logoff {
	display: -webkit-box;/* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
	display: -moz-box; /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
	display: -ms-flexbox;/* TWEENER - IE 10 */
	display: -webkit-flex; /* NEW - Chrome */
	display: flex; /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */

}
a.text1 {
	font-size: 30px;
	margin: 0 5px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
	.scroll_div {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
.scroll_div {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0px;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 9999;
	text-align: center;
}
.scroll_div .category {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.scroll_div .category#parents {
	background-color: rgba(255, 121, 48, 0.88);
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container {
	display: inline-block;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 799px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 13%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) and (max-width:1211px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 10px;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1212px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 20px;
	}
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container .more {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 1.3em;
	margin: 0px !important;
	line-height: 20px !important;
}
.scroll_div .category#schools {
	background-color: #00AD00;
}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}
.scroll_div .category p {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: Calibri;
	color: #fff;
}
.scroll_div .category p.parents,
.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {
	margin: -5px 0px 2px;
	font-size: 24px;
	font-weight: 700;
}
.scroll_div .category p a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	border: 2px solid #fff;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: none;
	transition: background-color 0.5s ease, border 0.5s ease;
}
.scroll_div .category p a:hover {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #fff;
	border: 2px solid white;
}
#formc {
	

	height: 25px;
}
#edsearch {
	width: 75px;
	height: 25px;
	padding: 2px;
}
@media screen and (min-width : 320px) and (max-width :480px) {
.requestdemo1 { display: none;}
.loginform { float: right; margin-top: 35px;}
.headerLogo { width: 50%; float: left;}
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: -15px;}
#formc {margin-left: 10px;}
#edsearch {margin-right: -200px; margin-top: -55px;}
.headerRightArea .navbar-form.navbar-left { display: none; }
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'], div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] > div { display: none; }
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: 0px !important; }
#search_bar { display: none !important; }
}

align-items: center;
text-align: center;
margin: 0 auto;

}
}

.flex-on-mobile .form-group{

margin-top:10px;

margin-left:30px;

margin-bottom:0px;
}
}

Lumos Learning Online Study Program


The Lumos learning Online Study Program helps reinforce the classroom learning experience for children in grades 3-8 through innovative use of technology and individualized instruction. It helps identify students’ strengths and weakness. Students can get immediate feedback after their practice sessions. Parents and teachers can collaborate when reviewing students’ work to gain insights into their progress and to help them improve in any area that is challenging to them. The process creates a collaborative learning platform for students, parents and teachers that is available all year long.

    bottom: 0;

  .cookie-popup {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    /*z-index: 1000;*/
    right: 0;
    /*width: 100%;
    background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);*/
    color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
    font-family: 'Roboto', 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
    z-index: 10001;
    text-align: center;
  }
  .cookie-popup-inner {
    /*display: table;
    width: 100%;*/
    border-radius: 5px;
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 0 auto;
    background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    padding: 5px 10px;
    position: relative;
    min-height: 24px;
    font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', helvetica, arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 13px;
    line-height: 24px;
    box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
  }
  .cookie-popup-left {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    padding: 0px;
  }
  .cookie-popup-headline {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
  .cookie-popup-sub-headline {
    font-size: 14px;
  }
  .cookie-popup-right {
    display: table-cell;
    vertical-align: middle;
    padding: 10px;
    text-align: center;
  }

    /*position: relative;

    font-size: 16px;

  }

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

function getQueryStringValue(key) {
	return unescape(window.location.search.replace(new RegExp("^(?:.*[&\\?]" + escape(key).replace(/[\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "(?:\\=([^&]*))?)?.*$", "i"), "$1"));
}
jQuery(function() {
	if (getQueryStringValue("ref") == 'form') {
		jQuery(".show-before-form-submit").hide();
		jQuery(".show-after-form-submit").show();
	}
});




font.text1 {
	margin: 10px 0px;
	display: block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 700;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0px 50px 5px 0px;
}
font.text1 a {
	color: royalblue;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
font.text1 a:hover {
	color: dodgerblue;
}
.login_logoff {
	display: -webkit-box;/* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
	display: -moz-box; /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
	display: -ms-flexbox;/* TWEENER - IE 10 */
	display: -webkit-flex; /* NEW - Chrome */
	display: flex; /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */
	flex-direction: row-reverse;
	-webkit-flex-direction: row-reverse;
}
a.text1 {
	font-size: 30px;
	margin: 0 5px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
	.scroll_div {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
.scroll_div {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0px;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 9999;
	text-align: center;
}
.scroll_div .category {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.scroll_div .category#parents {
	background-color: rgba(255, 121, 48, 0.88);
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container {
	display: inline-block;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 799px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 13%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) and (max-width:1211px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 10px;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1212px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 20px;
	}
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container .more {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 1.3em;
	margin: 0px !important;
	line-height: 20px !important;
}
.scroll_div .category#schools {
	background-color: #00AD00;
}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}
.scroll_div .category p {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: Calibri;
	color: #fff;
}
.scroll_div .category p.parents,
.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {
	margin: -5px 0px 2px;
	font-size: 24px;
	font-weight: 700;
}
.scroll_div .category p a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	border: 2px solid #fff;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: none;
	transition: background-color 0.5s ease, border 0.5s ease;
}
.scroll_div .category p a:hover {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #fff;
	border: 2px solid white;
}
#formc {
	

	height: 25px;
}
#edsearch {
	width: 75px;
	height: 25px;
	padding: 2px;
}
@media screen and (min-width : 320px) and (max-width :480px) {
.requestdemo1 { display: none;}
.loginform { float: right; margin-top: 35px;}
.headerLogo { width: 50%; float: left;}
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: -15px;}
#formc {margin-left: 10px;}
#edsearch {margin-right: -200px; margin-top: -55px;}
.headerRightArea .navbar-form.navbar-left { display: none; }
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'], div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] > div { display: none; }
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: 0px !important; }
#search_bar { display: none !important; }
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
.flex-on-mobile {
align-items: center;
text-align: center;
margin: 0 auto;
display: flex;	
}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
#formc {

width:150px;

}
.flex-on-mobile .form-group{

margin-top:10px;
}
.loginform {
margin-left:30px;
}
#edsearch {
margin-left:5px;
margin-bottom:0px;
}
}

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-previous a span, .nav-previous-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-previous a:hover, .nav-previous-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.nav-next a, .nav-next-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid #ddd;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-next a span, .nav-next-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-next a:hover, .nav-next-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.prev-post-text, .next-post-text {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	color: rgb(153, 153, 153);
}
p {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	line-height: 24px;
}
.comment_section {
	color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
}
#respond {
	margin-top: 1.07142857rem;
}
.required {
	color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
	font-size: 36px;
	vertical-align: text-top;
}
.nav-previous-post, .previous-post-image {
	display: block;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
	.comment_section {
		padding: 1.071428571rem 2.857142857rem;
		margin-top: 1.428571429rem;
		margin-bottom: 1.428571429rem;
		box-shadow: 0 0px 15px 3px rgb(153, 153, 153);
	}
}

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {

}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

function getQueryStringValue(key) {
	return unescape(window.location.search.replace(new RegExp("^(?:.*[&\\?]" + escape(key).replace(/[\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "(?:\\=([^&]*))?)?.*$", "i"), "$1"));
}
jQuery(function() {
	if (getQueryStringValue("ref") == 'form') {
		jQuery(".show-before-form-submit").hide();
		jQuery(".show-after-form-submit").show();
	}
});




font.text1 {
	margin: 10px 0px;
	display: block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 700;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0px 50px 5px 0px;
}
font.text1 a {
	color: royalblue;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
font.text1 a:hover {
	color: dodgerblue;
}
.login_logoff {
	display: -webkit-box;/* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
	display: -moz-box; /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
	display: -ms-flexbox;/* TWEENER - IE 10 */
	display: -webkit-flex; /* NEW - Chrome */
	display: flex; /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */
	flex-direction: row-reverse;
	-webkit-flex-direction: row-reverse;
}
a.text1 {
	font-size: 30px;
	margin: 0 5px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
	.scroll_div {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
.scroll_div {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0px;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 9999;
	text-align: center;
}
.scroll_div .category {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.scroll_div .category#parents {
	background-color: rgba(255, 121, 48, 0.88);
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container {
	display: inline-block;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 799px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 13%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) and (max-width:1211px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 10px;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1212px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 20px;
	}
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container .more {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 1.3em;
	margin: 0px !important;
	line-height: 20px !important;
}
.scroll_div .category#schools {
	background-color: #00AD00;
}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}
.scroll_div .category p {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: Calibri;
	color: #fff;
}
.scroll_div .category p.parents,
.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {
	margin: -5px 0px 2px;
	font-size: 24px;
	font-weight: 700;
}
.scroll_div .category p a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	border: 2px solid #fff;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: none;
	transition: background-color 0.5s ease, border 0.5s ease;
}
.scroll_div .category p a:hover {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #fff;
	border: 2px solid white;
}
#formc {
	

	height: 25px;
}
#edsearch {
	width: 75px;
	height: 25px;
	padding: 2px;
}
@media screen and (min-width : 320px) and (max-width :480px) {
.requestdemo1 { display: none;}
.loginform { float: right; margin-top: 35px;}
.headerLogo { width: 50%; float: left;}
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: -15px;}
#formc {margin-left: 10px;}
#edsearch {margin-right: -200px; margin-top: -55px;}
.headerRightArea .navbar-form.navbar-left { display: none; }
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'], div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] > div { display: none; }
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: 0px !important; }
#search_bar { display: none !important; }
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
.flex-on-mobile {
align-items: center;
text-align: center;
margin: 0 auto;
display: flex;	
}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
#formc {

width:150px;

}
.flex-on-mobile .form-group{

margin-top:10px;
}
.loginform {
margin-left:30px;
}
#edsearch {
margin-left:5px;
margin-bottom:0px;
}
}

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

height: 100%;*/
