function getQueryStringValue(key) {
	return unescape(window.location.search.replace(new RegExp("^(?:.*[&\\?]" + escape(key).replace(/[\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "(?:\\=([^&]*))?)?.*$", "i"), "$1"));
}
jQuery(function() {
	if (getQueryStringValue("ref") == 'form') {
		jQuery(".show-before-form-submit").hide();
		jQuery(".show-after-form-submit").show();
	}
});




font.text1 {
	margin: 10px 0px;
	display: block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 700;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0px 50px 5px 0px;
}
font.text1 a {
	color: royalblue;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
font.text1 a:hover {
	color: dodgerblue;
}
.login_logoff {
	display: -webkit-box;/* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
	display: -moz-box; /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
	display: -ms-flexbox;/* TWEENER - IE 10 */
	display: -webkit-flex; /* NEW - Chrome */
	display: flex; /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */
	flex-direction: row-reverse;
	-webkit-flex-direction: row-reverse;
}
a.text1 {
	font-size: 30px;
	margin: 0 5px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
	.scroll_div {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
.scroll_div {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0px;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 9999;
	text-align: center;
}
.scroll_div .category {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.scroll_div .category#parents {
	background-color: rgba(255, 121, 48, 0.88);
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container {
	display: inline-block;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 799px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 13%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) and (max-width:1211px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 10px;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1212px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 20px;
	}
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container .more {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 1.3em;
	margin: 0px !important;
	line-height: 20px !important;
}
.scroll_div .category#schools {
	background-color: #00AD00;
}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}
.scroll_div .category p {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: Calibri;
	color: #fff;
}
.scroll_div .category p.parents,
.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {
	margin: -5px 0px 2px;
	font-size: 24px;
	font-weight: 700;
}
.scroll_div .category p a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	border: 2px solid #fff;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: none;
	transition: background-color 0.5s ease, border 0.5s ease;
}
.scroll_div .category p a:hover {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #fff;
	border: 2px solid white;
}
#formc {
	

	height: 25px;
}
#edsearch {
	width: 75px;
	height: 25px;
	padding: 2px;
}
@media screen and (min-width : 320px) and (max-width :480px) {
.requestdemo1 { display: none;}
.loginform { float: right; margin-top: 35px;}
.headerLogo { width: 50%; float: left;}
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: -15px;}
#formc {margin-left: 10px;}
#edsearch {margin-right: -200px; margin-top: -55px;}
.headerRightArea .navbar-form.navbar-left { display: none; }
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'], div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] > div { display: none; }
h2.custompageheader { margin-top: 0px !important; }
#search_bar { display: none !important; }
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
.flex-on-mobile {
align-items: center;
text-align: center;
margin: 0 auto;
display: flex;	
}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 481px) and (max-width: 960px) {
#formc {

width:150px;

}
.flex-on-mobile .form-group{

margin-top:10px;
}
.loginform {
margin-left:30px;
}
#edsearch {
margin-left:5px;
margin-bottom:0px;
}
}

Schools’s out for summer, but that doesn’t mean students’ learning has to stop. Join Lumos Learning’s Director of Curriculum and educator,
Marisa Adams
 and Lumos Expert Teachers, 
Julie Lyons & Eric Ibsen-Johnson
, as they explore fun ways to keep their brain on and always learning, even while the rest of them is on vacation! In each session, we will explore different activities, games, apps, and other ways for students to stay engaged and beat the summer brain drain!




This workshop will be conducted in THREE separate sessions and each session will carry projects and home work assignments.




Access to Workshop Resources valid for an Year


















Session Details










Beating the Brain Drain through Literacy


Tuesday,  June 24, 2014 at 11:00 AM EST




Language Arts doesn’t have to be boring, and the summer is the best time to figure out why. It is the perfect opportunity to explore new writing opportunities, read new books, and even begin to think outside the box in terms of Language Arts. By the end of this session, you might even gain the skill to be a guest blogger on one of our websites!






Workshop Snippets






































Beating the Brain Drain through Computing


Tuesday,  July 29, 2014 at 11:00 AM EST




Math doesn’t have to always be let’s do problems over and over again. Hands on opportunities abound and the summer is the best time to learn about them. Through this session, you will explore some of the latest apps and games that keep you learning math skills without simply working problems. You will also practice some real world computing that can take you farther than you can imagine. By the end of summer, you might even be your family’s newest account manager!




















Warm-Up to a Great School Year


Saturday,  August 2, 2014 at 11:00 AM EST




Summer’s almost over. Get a head start to the new year. Spend some time exploring some final ways to keep your brain in gear as you prepare for the school year and focus on academic success.










Get it NOW!










If any student has schedule conflict with one or more sessions, he/she can watch the recorded sessions later.

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

.editorial {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 60px;
	max-height: 60px;
	margin: 0;
	z-index: 5;
	bottom: 0;
	position: absolute;
	left: 0px;
	float: left;
}

.parallax1>use {
	animation: move-forever1 10s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax2>use {
	animation: move-forever2 8s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax3>use {
	animation: move-forever3 6s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

.parallax4>use {
	animation: move-forever4 4s linear infinite;

	&:nth-child(1) {
		animation-delay: -2s;
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever1 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever2 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever3 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}
}

@keyframes move-forever4 {
	0% {
		transform: translate(-90px, 0%);
	}

	100% {
		transform: translate(85px, 0%);
	}
}

* {
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
	font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Float four columns side by side */
.column {
	float: left;
	width: 25%;
	padding: 0 10px;
}

/* Remove extra left and right margins, due to padding */
.row {
	margin: 0 -5px;
}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
	content: "";
	display: table;
	clear: both;
}

/* Responsive columns */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
	.column {
		width: 100%;
		display: block;
		margin-bottom: 20px;
	}
}

/* Style the counter cards */
.card {
	box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
	padding: 16px;
	text-align: center;
	background-color: #f1f1f1;
	border-radius: 28px;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: -65px;
	left: 100px;
	width: 65%;
}

.card img {
	border-radius: 30px;
	max-height: 75px;
	border: 3px solid grey;
	padding: 4px;
	background: white;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 20px;
	left: -25px;
}

	display: block;

	height: 100%;
}

.scrollination {
	position: fixed;
	top: 50%;
	right: 20px;
	transform: translateY(-50%);
	font-size: 1.4em;
	z-index: 10;
}

.scrollination a.active:after {
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
}

.scrollination a {
	display: block;
	width: 110px;
	height: 25px;
	border-radius: 50%;
	color: #fff;
	position: relative;
	padding: 4px;
}

.scrollination a:after {
	-webkit-transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	transition: box-shadow 0.5s ease;
	width: 12px;
	height: 12px;
	display: block;
	border: 2px solid;
	border-radius: 50%;
	content: '';
	position: absolute;
	margin: auto;
	top: 0;
	right: 4px;
	bottom: 0;
}

.scrollination a .hover-text {
	position: absolute;
	right: 20px;
	top: -5px;
	opacity: 0;
	-webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
	padding: 0 5px;
	background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	text-decoration: underline;
	margin-right: 5px;
}

.dropdown-menu>li>a:hover,
.dropdown-menu>li>a:focus {
	color: white;
	text-decoration: none;
	background-color: dodgerblue;
}

.scrollination a:hover .hover-text {
	opacity: 1;
}

.div-transparent:before {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	left: 5%;
	right: 5%;
	width: 90%;
	height: 1px;
	background-image: linear-gradient(to right, transparent, rgb(48, 49, 51), transparent);
}

.div-arrow-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -7px;
	left: calc(50% - 7px);
	width: 14px;
	height: 14px;
	transform: rotate(45deg);
	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
}

.div-tab-down:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: 0;
	left: calc(50% - 10px);
	width: 50px;
	height: 24px;

	background-color: white;
	border-bottom: 1px solid white;
	border-left: 1px solid white;
	border-right: 1px solid white;
	border-radius: 0 0 38px 38px;
}

.div-stopper:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -6px;
	left: calc(50% - 7px);
	width: 14px;
	height: 12px;
	background-color: white;
	border-left: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-right: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
}

.div-dot:after {
	content: "";
	position: absolute;
	z-index: 1;
	top: -9px;
	left: calc(50% - 9px);
	width: 18px;
	height: 18px;
	background-color: rgb(35, 161, 219);
	border: 1px solid rgb(48, 49, 51);
	border-radius: 50%;
	box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 2px white,
		0 0 0 4px white;
}

function numberWithCommas(x) {
	return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
}

$(document).ready(function() {

	$.ajax({
		url: "/llp/lumos_user_count_json.php",
		success: function(response) {
			var response = response.result;
			var comma_separator_number_step = jQuery.animateNumber.numberStepFactories.separator(',')
			jQuery("#schoolcount").animateNumber({
				number: response.schoolcount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
			jQuery("#teachercount").animateNumber({
				number: response.teachercount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
			jQuery("#studentcount").animateNumber({
				number: response.studentcount,
				numberStep: comma_separator_number_step
			}, 3000);
		}
	});
});

$(document).on('click', '#type-state-selection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	$("#userSelectionEditModal").modal();
	if (getCookie("userState") != '' && getCookie("userState") != null && getCookie("userType") != '' && getCookie("userType") != null && getCookie("userAssessment") != '' && getCookie("userAssessment") != null) {
		var userState = getCookie("userState");
		var userType = getCookie("userType");
		var userGrade = getCookie("userGrade");
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState').find('option[value="' + userState + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType').find('option[value="' + userType + '"]').attr("selected", true);
		$('#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade').find('option[value="' + userGrade + '"]').attr("selected", true);
	}
});


$(document).on('click', '#saveUserSelection', function(e) {
	e.preventDefault();
	if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '' || $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
		if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a State. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User tType. Please select one.");
			return false;
		} else if ($("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").val() == '') {
			$("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade").parent("div").addClass("has-warning");
			alert("You have not selected a User Grarde. Please select one.");
			return false;
		}
	} else {
		var userState = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").val();
		var userType = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userType option:selected").val();
		var userGrade = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userGrade option:selected").val();
		var userAssessment = $("#userSelectionEditModal .userSelectionForm .userState option:selected").attr('attr-assessment');
		setCookie("userState", userState, 30);
		setCookie("userType", userType, 30);
		setCookie("userAssessment", userAssessment, 30);
		setCookie("userGrade", userGrade, 30);
	}
	location.reload();
});

( function( grecaptcha, sitekey, actions ) {

	var wpcf7recaptcha = {

		execute: function( action ) {
			grecaptcha.execute(
				sitekey,
				{ action: action }
			).then( function( token ) {
				var forms = document.getElementsByTagName( 'form' );

				for ( var i = 0; i < forms.length; i++ ) {
					var fields = forms[ i ].getElementsByTagName( 'input' );

					for ( var j = 0; j < fields.length; j++ ) {
						var field = fields[ j ];

						if ( 'g-recaptcha-response' === field.getAttribute( 'name' ) ) {
							field.setAttribute( 'value', token );
							break;
						}
					}
				}
			} );
		},

		executeOnHomepage: function() {
			wpcf7recaptcha.execute( actions[ 'homepage' ] );
		},

		executeOnContactform: function() {
			wpcf7recaptcha.execute( actions[ 'contactform' ] );
		},

	};

	grecaptcha.ready(
		wpcf7recaptcha.executeOnHomepage
	);

	document.addEventListener( 'change',
		wpcf7recaptcha.executeOnContactform, false
	);

	document.addEventListener( 'wpcf7submit',
		wpcf7recaptcha.executeOnHomepage, false
	);

} )(
	grecaptcha,
	'6LfDE4UUAAAAAKqXFvbqLRjE-O_1IMU8rb25S1PD',
	{"homepage":"homepage","contactform":"contactform"}
);




function init() {
	var vidDefer = document.getElementsByTagName('iframe');
	for (var i=0; i<vidDefer.length; i++) {
		if(vidDefer[i].getAttribute('data-src')) {
			vidDefer[i].setAttribute('src',vidDefer[i].getAttribute('data-src'));
		}
	}

.cookie-popup.position-bottom {
	bottom: 0;
	/*box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);*/
}
.cookie-popup {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	left: 0;
	/*z-index: 1000;*/
	right: 0;
	/*width: 100%;
	background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);*/
	color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	font-family: 'Roboto', 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	z-index: 10001;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-inner {
	/*display: table;
	width: 100%;*/
	border-radius: 5px;
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 0 auto;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	padding: 5px 10px;
	position: relative;
	min-height: 24px;
	font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', helvetica, arial, sans-serif;
	font-size: 13px;
	line-height: 24px;
	box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
}
.cookie-popup-left {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 0px;
}
.cookie-popup-headline {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.cookie-popup-sub-headline {
	font-size: 14px;
}
.cookie-popup-right {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-right .close {
	/*position: relative;
	top: -15px;
	left: 0px;*/
	font-size: 16px;
	opacity: 0.5;
}
/*@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
	.cookie-popup-left {
		display: block;
	}
	.cookie-popup-right {
		display: block;
		text-align: center;
	}
}*/










function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");
	//console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
	document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

img.wp-smiley,
img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
	height: 1em !important;
	width: 1em !important;

	vertical-align: -0.1em !important;
	background: none !important;
	padding: 0 !important;

body {
	padding-top: 0px;
}
a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
iframe {
	max-width: 100% !important;
}
.navbar-header {
	float: none;
}
.navbar-inverse {
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	background: white;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	height: 70px;
	padding: 0;
}
.scroll-fixed-navbar.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	padding: 0px;
}
.logo_container {
	overflow-x: hidden;
}
.logo_container img {
	width: 70px;
}
.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
	padding: 5px 10px;
}
.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	font-size: 22px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus {
	color: rgb(30, 144, 255);
	background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.requestdemo1 {
	position: fixed;
	width: auto;
	right: 0px;
	top: 275px;
	z-index: 9999;
}
.requestdemo1 a {
	display: block;
}
.loginform {
	z-index: 100;
	margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
	height: 31px;
	overflow: hidden;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
}
.loginform a.login {
	height: 31px;
	width: 112px;
	text-indent: -9999px;
	display: block;
	background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/login_link_bg.png?x78814);
	margin: 0px auto;
}
.type-state-selection {
	margin: 7px 10px 0;
}
.type-state-selection.navbar-right.text-center a {
	margin-right: 10px;
}
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] {
	top: 105px !important;
}
.modal button.close {
	margin-top: -15px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
ul.homelinks li a.call-us {
	margin: 0px 0 0px;
	background: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/callus.png?x78814) no-repeat 8px 8px;
	border-top: 5px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
}
ul.homelinks li a {
	width: 100%;
	font-weight: normal;
	text-align: left;
	/* width: 301px; */
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	padding: 6px 0 9px 0px;
	display: block;
	margin: 0 0 0 0px;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
ul.homelinks li a span.head {
	font-size: 150%;
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	display: block;
}
ul.homelinks li a span {
	display: none;
	font-size: 100%;
	color: rgb(90, 100, 105);
	line-height: 1.5em;
	margin-left: 55px;
}
#requestDemoModal iframe {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
	.btn#edsearch {
		font-weight: 600;
		font-size: 16px;
	}
}
.main_header {
	color: white;
	font-size: 28px;
	font-weight: 800;
	margin-top: 10px;
	padding: 0 40px;
}
.navbar-nav>li {
	float: left;
	padding-left: 30px;
}
.imgtopright {
	text-align: center;
}
section.section {
	/*min-height: 45rem;
height: 100%;*/
	min-height: 100vh;
	padding: 0 0 30px;
}
	@media (max-width: 409px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 240px;
	}
}

@media (min-width: 410px) and (max-width: 767px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 290px;
	}
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
	.navbar-form.navbar-left {
		float: left;
	}
	.navbar-form.navbar-left .form-group {
		display: inline-block;
		width: 55%;
	}
	.loginform.navbar-right.show-on-mobile {
		display: block;
		float: right;
	}
	.hide-on-mobile {
		display: none;
	}
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 340px;
	}
	.hide-on-mobile {
		display: block;
	}
	.show-on-mobile {
		display: none;
	}
	.loginform.navbar-right.hide-on-mobile {
		margin-right: 15px;
	}
}

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
padding: 5px 10px;
}
.span.icon-text {
display: block;
margin: 30px 0 0 10px;
float: right;
}
.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
padding: 5px;
font-size: 30px;
}
#banner {
height: 400px;
}
.banner-inner:after {
background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/teacher.jpg?x78814);
}
.cta_buttons {
text-align: center;
}
.cta_buttons a {
font-size: 20px;
}
.cta_buttons a.not-banner {
color: #1A9FF9;

}
.cta_buttons a.not-banner:hover {
color: #fff;
background: #1A9FF9;
}
#mssw p, #mvp p, #wbw p, #slp p {
margin-bottom: 10px;
color: black;
}
ul.bullets {
margin: 0 0 10px 20px;
list-style: none;
}
ul.bullets li {
padding: 5px 0 5px 15px;
background: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/sprite.png?x78814) no-repeat 0px -78px;
color: black;
}
.green-arrow {
font-size: 16px;
}
.main_header {
color: white;
font-size: 28px;
font-weight: 800;
margin-top: 10px;
padding: 0 40px;
}
.sub_header {
color: yellow;
font-size: 35px;

margin-top: 40px;
padding: 0 40px;
}
.navbar-nav > li {
float: left;
padding-left: 30px;
}
.imgtopright {
text-align: center;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-brand:focus {
color: #00a8d6;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a:focus {
color: #00a8d6;
}
.section#banner {

}
#footer p {
color: #fff;
}
.footer-bottom {
margin: 20px 0;
}
.customers {
padding: 0;
}
.hover-details:hover .img-cover h3 {
bottom: 0%;
}
.top_text {

}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 751px) {
.btn.btn-default.price-btn:nth-of-type(1) {

}
.btn.btn-default.price-btn:nth-of-type(2) {

}
@media screen and (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1200px) {

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {

}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

	border: 1px solid rgb(224, 224, 224);
}
h2.page-title {
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(224, 224, 224);
	padding-bottom: 20px;
	font-weight: 500;
}
.author-description h4 {
	font-weight: 500;
	font-size: 18px;
}
.nav-previous a, .nav-next a {
	padding: 10px;
}
.nav-previous-post a, .nav-next-post a {
	padding: 10px 10px 5px 20px;
}
.nav-previous a, .nav-previous-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid rgb(221, 221, 221);
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-previous a span, .nav-previous-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-previous a:hover, .nav-previous-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.nav-next a, .nav-next-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid #ddd;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-next a span, .nav-next-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-next a:hover, .nav-next-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.prev-post-text, .next-post-text {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	color: rgb(153, 153, 153);
}
p {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	line-height: 24px;
}
.comment_section {
	color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
}
#respond {
	margin-top: 1.07142857rem;
}
.required {
	color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
	font-size: 36px;
	vertical-align: text-top;
}
.nav-previous-post, .previous-post-image {
	display: block;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
	.comment_section {
		padding: 1.071428571rem 2.857142857rem;
		margin-top: 1.428571429rem;
		margin-bottom: 1.428571429rem;
		box-shadow: 0 0px 15px 3px rgb(153, 153, 153);
	}
}

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {

function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

img.wp-smiley,
img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
	height: 1em !important;
	width: 1em !important;
	margin: 0 .07em !important;
	vertical-align: -0.1em !important;
	background: none !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
}
























body {
	padding-top: 0px;
}
a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
iframe {
	max-width: 100% !important;
}
.navbar-header {
	float: none;
}
.navbar-inverse {
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	background: white;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	height: 70px;
	padding: 0;
}
.scroll-fixed-navbar.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	padding: 0px;
}
.logo_container {
	overflow-x: hidden;
}
.logo_container img {
	width: 70px;
}
.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
	padding: 5px 10px;
}
.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	font-size: 22px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus {
	color: rgb(30, 144, 255);
	background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.requestdemo1 {
	position: fixed;
	width: auto;
	right: 0px;
	top: 275px;
	z-index: 9999;
}
.requestdemo1 a {
	display: block;
}
.loginform {
	z-index: 100;
	margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
	height: 31px;
	overflow: hidden;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
}
.loginform a.login {
	height: 31px;
	width: 112px;
	text-indent: -9999px;
	display: block;
	background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/login_link_bg.png?x78814);
	margin: 0px auto;
}
.type-state-selection {

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

What are the pro & cons of online and paper-based resources?


The tedbooks are subject specific whereas the StepUp program includes access to both Math and English Language Arts. The tedBook is a
blended learning resource. Some of the learning content and practice tests are in the printed format while others are online. The online StepUp
program subscription includes several additional benefits and personalizations that would not be available in the printed format. The tedbook is
a good option if your student needs access to learning resources without internet and computer. Please review your student’s learning preferences
and access needs while choosing between these two options.

tedBook:  In Test Prep tedBook you will get access only to two practice tests and all other access will be locked.  
Skills Builder tedBook is domain based.  You will not have access to “Practice Test.
Skills Mastery is a generic tedBook which can be accessed by all states and assessments.
You will have online access to the resources of the tedBook you have purchased.
You cannot avail Coach support or Homework Help on purchase of tedBook”

Test Prep Online Program: ·
-Access to Thousands of Learning Resources
-Performance Reports to Identify My Child’s Strengths and Weaknesses

Does Lumos help At-Risk Students?


Yes, Lumos Learning Supplemental programs have been successfully used to assist At-Risk students. Easy-to-use reports help educators identify weak areas and tailor personalized learning plans for each child. It provides an efficient framework for teachers to extend learning time for children through engaging materials and assessments. Teachers can create custom assessments as well as information eLearning lessons to complement classroom activities.

Our evidence based research shows that there were significant improvements in the performance of at-risk students in standardized tests after effective implementation of Lumos supplemental programs.



Can Teachers Use the Lumos Programs to Extend Classroom Learning Time?


Lumos Supplemental Programs create an opportunity for extending classroom learning through complementary computer based learning. After children return home from school, they can conveniently access the online program using any computer with internet access. In addition to assessments, teachers can use the Designer tool to provide easy access to a number of online resources that supplement their classroom lesson plans.



How to Blend e-Learning with Classroom Learning?


Teacher can easily create resources, lesson summaries and custom assessments using the Test Designer. Online assessments and lesson summaries help students get immediate feedback while the material is still fresh in their minds. The results of students online work can be readily monitored by teachers to help identify weak areas and to create remedial activities.

Library portal


Why are the usage metrics in Library Portal not matching what I have in the previous monthly report spreadsheets?


Please note that there might be a  slight difference in the usage metrics in this Library Portal and the monthly reports that were sent you earlier. This is due to the fact that the reports here are excluding any patron access to the Lumos StepUp program before they became members of the library. Ex. If a patron had accessed the StepUp program in Nov 2017 on his own and in Jan 2018 used the subscription via their library card, the reports in this Library Portal does not count the patron access in Nov 2017. However, in the monthly reports we used to send in the past, we used to count both Nov 2017 and Jan 2018 usage.


Billing


What payment methods do you accept?


Master Card, Visa, American Express, Discover and PayPal.


General Information


What software do I need?


All you need is a personal computer with internet access. No software installation is necessary. We recommend that you access the Lumos Online Program using a personal computer with Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6 or higher with broadband internet connection.


What courses do I buy?


For Grades 4 through 8, you can purchase Math, Language Arts and Science. For Grade 3, you can purchase Math and Language Arts.


Should I buy the books or the online program?


When you purchase books, you get the printed practice test books with detailed answer explanations and one-year access to online workbooks. Printed books are ideal for students that focus better without the computer. Using the online program, students can access both full-length practice tests and workbooks using any computer with internet access and a browser. Please select the option that best fits your child’s learning habits. Note that books are not available for all grades and subjects.


How soon will I have access after I sign up?


You will have immediate access to the training program after you pay. Just click on the “Begin” link associated with the course you’ve purchased.


Do I need to register?


Yes, registration is required to purchase the product. Please note that the registration itself is free. Payment is required for any courses purchased. Payment is not required if you are accessing the program through your school or library subscription. Lumos Learning is very sensitive to privacy issues.


Will I receive anything in the mail?


No, you will not receive any material through regular mail.


My Students are being logged off in between the test.


Lumos Learning website uses cookies. Please enable cookies in your browser to ensure that your website perform optimally. 


 Based on the browser that you are using, please use the instruction below to enable cookies.


To enable cookies for Google Chrome


To enable cookies for Firefox Browser


To enable cookies for Internet Explorer


To enable cookies In Safari


Google Chrome:

Step 1: Launch Google Chrome –> click on Chrome menu icon.
Step 2: Click the Settings option –> Afterward, click the blue Show advanced settings option at the bottom of the page, followed by the gray Content settings button located beneath the Privacy section.




Step 3: Enable cookies — Check the bubble directly left of the Allow local data to be set (recommended) option near the top of the resulting pop-up window to enable browser cookies. Click the gray Done button in the bottom-right corner when finished.




Mozilla FireFox:


Step 1: Open settings — Open Mozilla Firefox, click the main Firefox button in the upper-left corner of the browser window and select Options from the right side of the resulting drop-down menu. Afterward, click the masked Privacy tab located in the top navigation bar and select the Use custom settings for history option in the drop-down menu of the panel’s History section.




Step 2: Enable cookies — Check the box directly left of the Accept cookies from sites option near the middle of the History section to enable browser cookies. Although disabling third-party cookies has been known to stop some types of ad tracking, you can use the drop-down menu beneath the checkbox to ensure Accept third-party cookies is set to Always. Afterwards, use the drop-down menu to the right of Keep until to specify how long you’d like Firefox to store cookies. Additionally, clicking the gray Show cookies and Exceptions buttons will provide you with an extensive list of stored cookies and a means of adding individual host names to the list. Click the gray OK button located at the bottom of the window when finished.




Internet Explore:


Step 1: Open settings — Launch Internet Explorer, click the Tools menu icon represented by the cog in the upper-right corner of the browser window, and select Internet options near the bottom of the resulting drop-down menu. Then, click the Privacy tab located in the top navigation bar.




Step 2: Enable cookies — Move the slider within the Settings section of the Privacy tab all the way to the bottom to accept all browser cookies. Then, click the gray Advanced button near the bottom of the slider and check the box directly left of the Override automatic cookie handling option to access first and third-party cookie blocking. Adjusting the slider up from Accept all cookies to Low will grant options for adding individual host names to the list through the gray Sites button beneath the slider.  Click the gray OK button located at the bottom of the window when finished.




Safari:


Step 1: Navigate the settings panel — Launch Safari, click Safari in upper-left corner of the main menu bar, and select the Preferences option near the top of the drop-down menu. Afterward, click the silhouetted Privacy tab located in the top navigation bar.




Step 2: Enable cookies — Check the box beside the Always option located directly right of Block cookies and other website data to enable browser cookies. Alternatively, select either of two other options to greater adjust your cookie functionality or click the gray Details button near the top of the window to view an extensive list of stored cookies,. Here, they’re broken down by the number of cookies and other data. Click the close button in the top-left corner when finished.

	background-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);*/
	color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
	font-family: 'Roboto', 'Noto Sans', sans-serif;
	z-index: 10001;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-inner {
	/*display: table;
	width: 100%;*/
	border-radius: 5px;
	display: inline-block;
	margin: 0 auto;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	padding: 5px 10px;
	position: relative;
	min-height: 24px;
	font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', helvetica, arial, sans-serif;
	font-size: 13px;
	line-height: 24px;
	box-shadow: 0 -4px 6px rgba(50,50,93,.11), 0 -1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
}
.cookie-popup-left {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 0px;
}
.cookie-popup-headline {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.cookie-popup-sub-headline {
	font-size: 14px;
}
.cookie-popup-right {
	display: table-cell;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: center;
}
.cookie-popup-right .close {
	/*position: relative;
	top: -15px;
	left: 0px;*/
	font-size: 16px;
	opacity: 0.5;
}
/*@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
	.cookie-popup-left {
		display: block;
	}
	.cookie-popup-right {
		display: block;
		text-align: center;
	}
}*/










function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");
	//console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
	document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

img.wp-smiley,
img.emoji {
	display: inline !important;
	border: none !important;
	box-shadow: none !important;
	height: 1em !important;
	width: 1em !important;
	margin: 0 .07em !important;
	vertical-align: -0.1em !important;
	background: none !important;
	padding: 0 !important;
}














































	.input-group {
		display: flex;
	}
	body
	{
		padding-top: 5px;
		max-width: 100%;
		overflow-x: hidden;
		font-family:-webkit-body ;
		color: black;
	}
	.has-error { 
		border-color: #a94442;
		-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075);	 	 
		box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075);
	}
	.has-email-error {	 	 

		border-color: #a94442;
		color: brown;
		-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075);	 	 
		box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075); 	 	 
	}	 	 
	.has-no-error{	 	 
		border-color: #38c43c;
		color: skyblue;
		-webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075);	 	 
		box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .075);	 	 
	}
	
	p {
		margin-bottom: 10px;
		line-height: 28px;
	}
	.Custom-footer{
		padding: 10px;
		background: black;
		color: white;
		font-size: 20px;
		text-align: center;
	}
	.Copyright{
		text-align: center;
		font-size: 20px;
		margin: 10px;
	}

	.topimage {
		background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Summer-Learning-HeadStart-Header.jpg?x78814);
		margin-bottom: 0px;
		height: 256px;
		background-size: 100%;
		width: 100%;
		background-position: center;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
	}
	.center {
		display: block;
		margin-left: auto;
		margin-right: auto;
		width: 50%;
	}

	.testimonial-inner p {
		display: block;
		position: relative;
		font-style: italic;
	}
	p.testimonial-text {
		text-align: center;
	}
	.testimonial-inner p.testimonial-text::before {
		font-family: 'FontAwesome';
		content: "\f10d";
		font-size: 18px;
		font-weight: bold;
		padding-right: 5px;
	}
	.testimonial-inner p.testimonial-text::after {
		font-family: 'FontAwesome';
		content: "\f10e";
		font-size: 18px;
		font-weight: bold;
		padding-left: 5px;
	}
	.section {
		padding: 0px 0;
	}
	.btn-success:hover {
		background-color: white !important;
		color: black !important;
	}
.carousel {
    /* position: relative; */
    display: contents;
}

	.colorchange {

		margin: 0 auto;

	}

	.awesome {

		font-family: futura;
		font-style: italic;

		width:100%;

		margin: 0 auto;
		text-align: center;

		color:#313131;

		font-weight: bold;

		-webkit-animation:colorchange 20s infinite alternate;


	}

	@-webkit-keyframes colorchange {
		0% {

			color: blue;
		}

		10% {

			color: green;
		}

		20% {

			color: yellow;
		}

		30% {

			color: white;
		}

		40% {

			color: almond;
		}

		50% {

			color: brown;
		}

		60% {

			color: skyblue;
		}

		70% {

			color: white;
		}
		80% {

			color: aqua;
		}

		90% {

			color: beige;
		}

		100% {

			color: pink;
		}
	}

	.Trusted_titl {
		background: #ff3b00;
		color:white;
		border-right: 1px solid #fff;
		font-size: 28px !important;
		font-weight: 600 !important;
		padding: 13px !important;
		margin-bottom: 0px !important; 
		font-family: -webkit-body !important;
	}
	.schools_count h3{
		font-size: 28px !important;
		font-weight: 600 !important;
		padding: 5px !important;
		margin-bottom: 0px !important; 
		font-family: -webkit-body !important; 
	}
	.schools_count{
		background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;
		color: black !important;
		margin-bottom:1px ridge orange !important;
	}
	.teachers_count{

		background-color: #f5f5f5;
		color: black;
		margin-bottom:1px ridge orange;
	}
	.teachers_count h3{
		font-size: 28px;
		font-weight: 600;
		padding: 5px;
		margin-bottom: 0px; 
		color:black;
		margin-bottom:1px ridge orange;
		font-family: -webkit-body; 
	}
	.students_count{
		background-color: #f5f5f5;
		color:black;
		font-size: 28px !important;

		font-weight: 600;
		color: black;
		font-family: -webkit-body;
		margin-bottom: 0px !important; 
	}
	.students_count h3{
		font-size: 28px !important;

		font-weight: 600;
		padding: 5px;
		color:black;

		font-family: -webkit-body; 
		margin-bottom: 0px !important; 
	}
	.parallax{


		background-attachment: fixed;
		background-position: center;
		background-repeat: no-repeat;
		background-size: cover;
	}
	.headline h2{
		color:green;
		font-weight: 700;
		padding:12px;
		font-size: 45px;
	}
	.product_details li{

		line-height: 65px;
		font-size: 19px;
	}
	.amz_product_details{
		border: 1px solid grey;
		padding:16px;
		border-radius: 10px;
		box-shadow: -2px 2px 5px grey;
		margin-top: 20px;
		margin-bottom: 20px;
	}
	.amz_product_details a{

		margin-left:51px;

		font-size: 20px;
	}
	.book_img img{

		max-width:100%;
		height: 373px;
		box-shadow: 7px 0px 18px grey;

	}
	.product_specification p{
		font-size: 18px;    


	}
	.product_specification li{

		line-height: 41px;
		font-size: 16px;
		list-style-type: disc;

	}
	.covers_all p
	{
		padding: 8px;
		margin: 0px;
		font-size: 30px;
		text-align: center;
		color: white;
	}
	.header-content a
	{
		margin:10px 0px;
	}
	.header-content .btn-lg{
		padding: 22px 32px;
		font-size: 22px;
		line-height: 1.33;
		border-radius: 6px;
	}

	.banner_content{
		margin-left: 0px;


	}
	.header-content li{
		font-size: 24px;
		color: white;
		line-height: 15px;
		font-weight: 500;
		list-style-type: none;
	}
	.header-content h2{
		color: #2d9bd6;
		font-size: 45px;
		font-weight: 800;
		margin-bottom: 10px;
		line-height: 40px;
	}
	.header-content h1{
		color: white;
		font-weight: 600;
		font-size: 28px;

	}
	.btn-lg, .btn-group-lg > .btn {
		padding: 10px 16px;
		font-size: 18px;
		line-height: 1.33;
		border-radius: 0px;
		background-color: orangered;
		display: -webkit-box;
		text-align: -webkit-center;
		border: 1px solid darkgreen!important;
		color:white;
	}
	.btn-lg:hover {
		background-color: white !important;
		color:black;
	}
	.button {
		display: inline-block;
		border-radius: 15px;
		background-color: #f4511e;
		border: none;

			function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
				var d = new Date();
				d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
				var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
				document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
			}
			function getCookie(cname) {
				var name = cname + "=";
				var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
				var ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
				for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
					var c = ca[i];
					while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
						c = c.substring(1);
					}
					if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
						return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
					}
				}
				return "";
			}
			function deleteCookie(name) {
				document.cookie = name + '=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;' + ';path=/';
			}
			function numberWithCommas(x) {
				return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
			}
			function getParameterByName(name, url) {
				if (!url) url = window.location.href;
				name = name.replace(/[\[\]]/g, "\\$&");
				var regex = new RegExp("[?&]" + name + "(=([^&#]*)|&|#|$)"),
				results = regex.exec(url);
				if (!results) return null;
				if (!results[2]) return '';
				return decodeURIComponent(results[2].replace(/\+/g, " "));
			}

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

body {
	padding-top: 0px;
}
a {
	white-space: normal !important;
}
img {
	max-width: 100% !important;
	height: auto;
}
iframe {
	max-width: 100% !important;
}
.navbar-header {
	float: none;
}
.navbar-inverse {
	padding-top: 0;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	background: white;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	height: 70px;
	padding: 0;
}
.scroll-fixed-navbar.navbar-inverse .navbar-brand {
	padding: 0px;
}
.logo_container {
	overflow-x: hidden;
}
.logo_container img {
	width: 70px;
}
.logo_container .navbar-brand.text-logo {
	padding: 5px 10px;
}
.navigation.navbar-collapse.collapse {
	padding: 5px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	font-size: 22px;
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>li>a:focus {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:hover,
.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav>.open>a:focus {
	color: rgb(30, 144, 255);
	background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
.requestdemo1 {
	position: fixed;
	width: auto;
	right: 0px;
	top: 275px;
	z-index: 9999;
}
.requestdemo1 a {
	display: block;
}
.loginform {
	z-index: 100;
	margin: 18px 0 10px 0;
	height: 31px;
	overflow: hidden;
	font-size: 1.1em;
	text-align: center;
}
.loginform a.login {
	height: 31px;
	width: 112px;
	text-indent: -9999px;
	display: block;
	background-image: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/login_link_bg.png?x78814);
	margin: 0px auto;
}
.type-state-selection {
	margin: 7px 10px 0;
}
.type-state-selection.navbar-right.text-center a {
	margin-right: 10px;
}
div[id*='comm100-float-button-'] {
	top: 105px !important;
}
.modal button.close {
	margin-top: -15px;
	font-size: 30px;
}
ul.homelinks li a.call-us {
	margin: 0px 0 0px;
	background: url(https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/callus.png?x78814) no-repeat 8px 8px;
	border-top: 5px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
	border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(192, 71, 38);
}
ul.homelinks li a {
	width: 100%;
	font-weight: normal;
	text-align: left;
	/* width: 301px; */
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	padding: 6px 0 9px 0px;
	display: block;
	margin: 0 0 0 0px;
	background: rgb(255, 255, 255);
}
ul.homelinks li a span.head {
	font-size: 150%;
	color: rgb(215, 90, 32);
	display: block;
}
ul.homelinks li a span {
	display: none;
	font-size: 100%;
	color: rgb(90, 100, 105);
	line-height: 1.5em;
	margin-left: 55px;
}
#requestDemoModal iframe {
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
	.btn#edsearch {
		font-weight: 600;
		font-size: 16px;
	}
}
.main_header {
	color: white;
	font-size: 28px;
	font-weight: 800;
	margin-top: 10px;
	padding: 0 40px;
}
.navbar-nav>li {
	float: left;
	padding-left: 30px;
}
.imgtopright {
	text-align: center;

section.section {
	/*min-height: 45rem;
height: 100%;*/

	@media (max-width: 409px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 240px;
	}
}

@media (min-width: 410px) and (max-width: 767px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 290px;
	}
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
	.navbar-form.navbar-left {
		float: left;
	}
	.navbar-form.navbar-left .form-group {
		display: inline-block;
		width: 55%;
	}
	.loginform.navbar-right.show-on-mobile {
		display: block;
		float: right;
	}
	.hide-on-mobile {
		display: none;
	}
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
	.navbar-brand img {
		width: 340px;
	}
	.hide-on-mobile {
		display: block;
	}
	.show-on-mobile {
		display: none;
	}
	.loginform.navbar-right.hide-on-mobile {
		margin-right: 15px;
	}
}

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

Stop! In the Name of Education:  Prevent Summer Learning Loss With 7 Simple Steps by Julie C. Lyons





div.Tags h3{
font-size: 16px;
color:black !important;
display:inline-block;
}



Summer Fun With Lumos Teachers


Summer Learning loss is defined as “a loss of knowledge and skills . . . most commonly due to . . . . extended breaks [during the summertime] ” (from 
edglossary.org/learning-loss
). Many teachers have certainly had the experience of taking the first month of school not only to introduce his or her rules and procedures to the class but also to get the kids back “up to speed” with thinking, remembering what they’ve learned . . . and in many cases, reviewing previous content. With a traditional school calendar, then, this can mean that up to 10% of the school year is spent playing catch-up.




What’s a parent to do? Fortunately, there are some simple steps you can take with your child to help your son or daughter both enjoy the summer and keep those all-important skills honed and fresh:






Summer Learning Kit for Parents




Access Now!




(1)Read!


Research supports the relationship between independent reading and student achievement, so simply having your child read daily will make a positive difference. Check out the following sources to 
find books
 & 
eBooks to beat summer slide
 to that your child will want to dive into: your public library, local bookstores, online stores (Amazon, Barnes and Noble, half.com, etc.), and yard sales (if the family hosting the sale has children a bit older than your own, you stand a good chance of scoring discarded books that are a perfect match for your son or daughter’s reading level).


(2) Write!


Have your child write letters to out-of-town friends and family, or write postcards while on vacation. A summer journal is another way to document summer activities. For the artistic or tech-savvy child, you may choose to create a family scrapbook with captions (consider the online options at Shutterfly, Mixbook, and Smilebox). Not only will you preserve this summer’s memories, but your child will also continue to practice his or her writing skills! (See 
Summer is Here! Ideas to Keep Your Child’s Writing Skills Sharp
 for more writing ideas.)


(3)Do the Math!


Think of ways your child can incorporate math skills into daily activities: have a yard sale, and put your child in charge of the cash box; help younger ones organize a lemonade stand (to practice salesmanship and making change). Or simply purchase a set of inexpensive flash cards to practice basic facts while waiting in line or on a long car ride. There’s even a host of free online games that will keep your child’s math skills sharp.


(4)“Homeschool” Your Child.


Keeping your child’s skills fresh doesn’t have to cost a fortune: check out some of the Lumos Learning workbooks and online resources (at 
www.lumoslearning.com/store
), and your child can work through several exercises each day. Even as little as twenty minutes a day can yield positive results, and it’s easy to work in a small block of time here and there. For instance, your child can work in the book during a car ride, right before bedtime, etc. Or, simply make this part of your child’s morning routine. For example: wake up, eat breakfast, complete chores, and then work in the workbook for 20 minutes. With time, you can make this a natural habit.


(5)Go Back-to-School Shopping (For a Great Summer School Learning Experience).


Check out offerings from the big names (think Sylvan, Huntington, Mathnasium, and Kumon), and also consider local summer schools. Some school districts and local colleges provide learning programs: research the offerings on-line for more information regarding the available options in your area.


(6)Take a Hike . . . Go Camping!


But “camp” doesn’t always involve pitching a tent in the great outdoors. Nowadays, there are camps for every interest: sports camps, art camp, music camp, science camp, writing camp . . . the possibilities are endless! With a quick Internet search, you’ll be able to turn up multiple options that will appeal to your son or daughter. And even if these camps aren’t “academic”, the life skills and interpersonal experiences are certain to help your child succeed in the “real world”. For example, working together as a cast to put on a summer theater production involves memorizing lines, cooperation, stage crew coordination, and commitment – all skills that can come in handy when it comes to fostering a good work ethic and the ability to collaborate with others.


(7)Get tutored.


Many teachers offer tutoring services throughout the summer months, either for individuals or small groups of students. Even the most school-averse student tends to enjoy the personal attention of a former teacher in a setting outside of the classroom. Plus, a tutor can tailor his or her instruction to pinpoint your child’s needs – so you can maximize the tutoring sessions with the skills and concepts your child needs the most help with.


Of course, you don’t need to do all seven steps to ensure that your child maintains his or her skills. Just following through with one or two of these options will go a long way toward continued learning, skills maintenance, and easing the transition to school when summer draws to a close.

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

.scrollination {
  position: fixed;
  top: 50%;
  right: 20px;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  font-size: 1.4em;
  z-index: 10;
}
.scrollination a.active:after {
  box-shadow: inset 0 0 0 5px;
}
.scrollination a {
  display: block;
  width: 110px;
  height: 25px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  color: #fff;
  position: relative;
  padding: 4px;
}
.scrollination a:after {
  -webkit-transition:box-shadow 0.5s ease;
  transition:box-shadow 0.5s ease;
  width:12px;
  height:12px;
  display: block;
  border:2px solid;
  border-radius:50%;
  content:'';
  position: absolute;
  margin:auto;
  top:0;
  right:4px;
  bottom:0;
}
.scrollination a .hover-text {
  position: absolute;
  right: 20px;
  top: -5px;
  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
  padding: 0 5px;
  background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
  text-decoration: underline;
  margin-right: 5px;
}
.scrollination a:hover .hover-text {
  opacity: 1;
}

A Comprehensive and Robust Solution to Support Distance Learning


















Collaborative LMS

                            The program is accessible from your PC, smartphone, or tablet. If you happen to run into any problem or need assistance, we are here to help you 24/7.
 
                        






















Identify and Remediate Learning Loss 












Many research suggests that students will return to school in the 2020-21 school year with 6 to 9 months of learning loss due to COVID and Summer slide. The biggest challenge for educators is to identify these learning losses in each student and remediate before starting new grade-level instruction.


Lumos Back To School Refresher Helps Educators:


  Identify the learning loss in students caused by COVID and summer slide.


 Drive targeted remedial practice to overcome learning losses.


 Have access to insightful student performance reports.


Lumos Back to School refresher helps students have a successful academic year.








Learn More
















Boost CMAS test scores and Improve Student achivement












Lumos StepUp is an innovative online learning program designed to help students master critical skills and prepare for the CMAS. The program offers two full-length practice test that mirrors CMAS assessment along with personalized remedial practice.

With over a decade of experience in developing practice resources for standardized tests, Lumos Learning has created a dynamic system to help students succeed on the state assessments.Lumos Smart Test Practice methodology offers students a realistic CMAS assessment rehearsal and the tools to overcome each proficiency gap.

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}

}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

      $("#clearhistory-btn").css("pointer-events", "");
      $("#loader").removeClass("show");

      document.getElementById('SMdropbtnid').removeAttribute('disabled');
      if(schoolfaqid){        
        schoolfaqid.removeAttribute('disabled');
        lumosfaqid.removeAttribute('disabled');
        $("#schoolfaq").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#schoolfaq").addClass("show"); 
        $("#lumosfaq").removeClass("hidden");
        $("#lumosfaq").addClass("show");      
        document.querySelector("#kbconversation").style.display = "none";
        document.querySelector("#conversation").style.display = "block";    
        lumosfaqid.setAttribute('style','opacity:1;font-size:13px');
        schoolfaqid.setAttribute('style','opacity:0.3;font-size:13px');
        START_SM();   
      }else{
        START_SM();
      }
    }

      margin:auto;

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
	//console.log("not available");

	document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

  function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
    var d = new Date();
    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
    var expires = "expires="+ d.toUTCString();
    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + "; " + expires + ";path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-previous a span, .nav-previous-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-previous a:hover, .nav-previous-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.nav-next a, .nav-next-post a {
	color: rgb(25, 81, 124);
	font-weight: bold;
	border: 1px solid #ddd;
	border-radius: 3px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 3px;
	-khtml-border-radius: 3px;
	-moz-border-radius: 3px;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% rgb(238, 238, 238);
	display: block;
}
.nav-next a span, .nav-next-post a span {
	font-size: 20px;
}
.nav-next a:hover, .nav-next-post a:hover {
	color: #fff;
	background: #143855;
	border: 1px solid #143855;
}
.prev-post-text, .next-post-text {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	color: rgb(153, 153, 153);
}
p {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	line-height: 24px;
}
.comment_section {
	color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
}
#respond {
	margin-top: 1.07142857rem;
}
.required {
	color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
	font-size: 36px;
	vertical-align: text-top;
}
.nav-previous-post, .previous-post-image {
	display: block;
	padding-bottom: 10px;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
	.comment_section {
		padding: 1.071428571rem 2.857142857rem;
		margin-top: 1.428571429rem;
		margin-bottom: 1.428571429rem;
		box-shadow: 0 0px 15px 3px rgb(153, 153, 153);
	}
}

function createCookie(name, value, days) {
	var date, expires;
	if (days) {
		date = new Date();
		date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
		expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
	} else {
		expires = "";
	}
	document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
}
function getCookie(cname) {
	var name = cname + "=";
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
		var c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
			c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
			return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
		}
	}
	return "";
}
if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {

}
function hideCookiePopup() {
	//console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
	document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
	createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
	return false;
}

function getQueryStringValue(key) {
	return unescape(window.location.search.replace(new RegExp("^(?:.*[&\\?]" + escape(key).replace(/[\.\+\*]/g, "\\$&") + "(?:\\=([^&]*))?)?.*$", "i"), "$1"));
}
jQuery(function() {
	if (getQueryStringValue("ref") == 'form') {
		jQuery(".show-before-form-submit").hide();
		jQuery(".show-after-form-submit").show();
	}
});




font.text1 {
	margin: 10px 0px;
	display: block;
	font-size: 18px;
	font-weight: 700;
	text-align: right;
	padding: 0px 50px 5px 0px;
}
font.text1 a {
	color: royalblue;
	text-decoration: underline;
}
font.text1 a:hover {
	color: dodgerblue;
}
.login_logoff {
	display: -webkit-box;/* OLD - iOS 6-, Safari 3.1-6 */
	display: -moz-box; /* OLD - Firefox 19- (buggy but mostly works) */
	display: -ms-flexbox;/* TWEENER - IE 10 */
	display: -webkit-flex; /* NEW - Chrome */
	display: flex; /* NEW, Spec - Opera 12.1, Firefox 20+ */
	flex-direction: row-reverse;
	-webkit-flex-direction: row-reverse;
}
a.text1 {
	font-size: 30px;
	margin: 0 5px;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 599px) {
	.scroll_div {
		display: none !important;
	}
}
.scroll_div {
	position: fixed;
	top: 0px;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 9999;
	text-align: center;
}
.scroll_div .category {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
}
.scroll_div .category#parents {
	background-color: rgba(255, 121, 48, 0.88);
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container {
	display: inline-block;
	background: url("https://statc.lumoslearning.com/llwp/wp-content/themes/twentyeleven/images/body_bg2.png?x78814") repeat-x scroll 0px -110px #FFF;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 600px) and (max-width: 799px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 17%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 13%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 1px !important;
		margin: 0;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 800px) and (max-width:1211px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 10px;
	}
}
@media screen and (min-width: 1212px) {
	.scroll_div .category#more-container {
		width: 11%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category {
		width: 14%;
	}
	.scroll_div .category p a {
		padding: 3px 6px;
		margin: 0 20px;
	}
}
.scroll_div .category#more-container .more {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	line-height: 1.3em;
	margin: 0px !important;
	line-height: 20px !important;
}
.scroll_div .category#schools {
	background-color: #00AD00;
}
.scroll_div .category#libraries {
	background-color: #000;
}
.scroll_div .category p {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: Calibri;
	color: #fff;
}
.scroll_div .category p.parents,
.scroll_div .category p.schools,
.scroll_div .category p.libraries {
	margin: -5px 0px 2px;
	font-size: 24px;
	font-weight: 700;
}
.scroll_div .category p a {
	color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
	border: 2px solid #fff;
	border-radius: 5px;
	background-color: none;
	transition: background-color 0.5s ease, border 0.5s ease;
}
.scroll_div .category p a:hover {
	color: #000;
	background-color: #fff;
	border: 2px solid white;
}

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }
  if (getCookie("cookiepopupHide") != 'Y' && getCookie("UserID") == '' && getCookie("CurStudentID") == '') {
    //console.log("not available");
    //console.log(document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML);
    document.getElementById("cookie-popup-container").innerHTML = '<div class="cookie-popup position-bottom" style="display: block;"><div class="cookie-popup-inner"><div class="cookie-popup-left"><div class="cookie-popup-sub-headline">By using this website you agree to our <a href="https://www.lumoslearning.com/llwp/cookies-policy.html" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a></div></div><div class="cookie-popup-right"><button type="button" class="close cookie-popup-accept-cookies" onclick="hideCookiePopup()"><i class="ionicons ion-close-round"></i></button></div></div>';
  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
    document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display = "none";
    createCookie('cookiepopupHide', 'Y', 30);
    return false;
  }

School’s out for the summer, but that doesn’t mean that your child’s learning has to stop.


Summer Learning HeadStart Online Program






We have created a great resource to help your child avoid summer academic slump. Lumos Summer Learning HeadStart is designed to help kids gain reading, writing, and vocabulary mastery. It also encourages students to develop journaling skills by offering a summer diary to enter their daily experiences from summer.












Key benefit include access to:




Enagaging Reading Practice


Fun vocabulary tasks


Summer diary to record experiences


Fun activity ideas


Summer Workshop with Expert Teachers


Summer short story competition




























What Our Customers Say


“I buy my child the Lumos Program every year and it has made such a difference. Preparation with these courses has always assisted him in getting high scores and given him the opportunity to participate in the Gifted and Talented Program for Math at school.”


Mrs. Williams, Parent




















Stop the summer learning loss!
















Subscribe now!












Select Grade

Grade 3-4

Student Login Name












Parent’s Email




























Anywhere Access






Satisfaction Guaranteed
































Summer Skills Mastery Workshops Archives










1. Beating the Brain Drain through Literacy


Language Arts doesn’t have to be boring.  Summer vacation can be a perfect opportunity to read for fun or see how writing can be useful even outside of school. By the end of this session, you might even write well enough to be a guest blogger on one of our websites!








Workshop Snippets








































2. Beating the Brain Drain through Computing


Summer presents an ideal opportunity for you to see how math is used in the real world. Through this session, you will explore some of the latest apps and games that keep you learning math skills that you can actually use. By the end of summer, you might even be your family’s newest budget manager!




















3. Warm-Up to a Great School Year


Going back to school after summer vacation doesn’t have to be traumatic. If you are prepared it can almost be effortless. Spend some time exploring some final ways to keep your brain in gear as you prepare for the school year and focus on academic success.




















What Educators Say


“This is an excellent practice program for all grades. Students in our district could benefit from the access to the online materials so that they can work on additional cooncepts based on areas of weakness.”


Ms. Julie Lyons, Teacher

  function createCookie(name, value, days) {
    var date, expires;
    if (days) {
      date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    } else {
      expires = "";
    }
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }
  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i = 0; i <ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length,c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

  }
  function hideCookiePopup() {
    //console.log(document.getElementsByClassName('cookie-popup')[0].style.display);
